text: I am here right now.  Returned a uhaul to them and accidentally left my house key in truck.  Came first thing and property is unlocked but no one is here for over 30 minutes.  Tried calling and it goes to a number that says voicemail is not set up.  Have been here for over 30 min.

text: Don't put store hours if you can't bother to show up when your supposed to be open. Much less add a phone number that doesn't work.

text: Went to get a hub stem replaced. They didn't re secure by caliper and it would've caused serious damage and maybe serious injury or death if another mechanic didn't catch it first. Also, they're sometimey about answering that phone and when they open. If you're about business, not the place to go.

name: Christopher Roberts
text: Service was quick and perfect. My cars have not looked this good since I first bought them. I highly recommend this place if you want your car to look and smell brand new again.

name: Dean Allen
text: Had a screw in my daughter's tire. Called them and said to bring it down. Within 5-10 minutes they had it patched/plugged and I was on my way home. Not bad for $10 and tipped the guy $5 for the quick service.

text: Good but needs to lower prices

name: Alexander Sanders
text: Those guys did a great job with detailing my cars and plus they have great tires and they are respectful thanks you again Edward Detailing!

text: Great place! 5 star service 5 star people. Has happen on two separate occasions and been great both times.

name: Orixion Sephaos
text: These guys are amazing. I had a flat and they got to me quickly and got it fixed just as fast. Never had anyone have the patience to walk me through giving them the details they needed for the tire. And, some of the highest quality of customer service I've ever seen in the business!

name: Latifha Gwinn
text: I came to get one tire for my car but both of my front tires was messed up one was a donut and the other had wire coming out of it.. The guy told me he'll put both front tires on to come back when I get paid and pay for the other tire.. I am very grateful for him!! This was a blessing!! And they are very nice people!!

name: Susie Hale
text: We were very pleased with Circle T Tires. They changed the tires while my children and I waited in our car. This company has reasonable prices and quick service!

name: Mickie Thomason
text: AMAZING!!! Thank you very much for helping me out when I needed it. You helped more than you think you did and I hope you know I'm very grateful & you are truly appreciated! These guys came to my rescue when I had a flat tire. Actually came to my home....knowing before hand that I didn't have money for a new tire. I gave him what I had at the time & promised I would bring him more money in a few days. Bless you and your sweet crew!

name: Christi Corfee (Corfee Fam)
text:
I highly recommend Circle T tires, but only if you don't value the safety of your family, integrity of your vehicle or the integrity of the people that work on your vehicle. If you don't value these things, this shop is perfect for you! However , if you find safety and integrity important I highly recommend that you go elsewhere.

Not only did Circle T put on a tire that blew 2 days after they put it on, but in the process broke my turn signal lever. I allowed multiple opportunities for Chris to make the situation right. After a month of false promises I have decided that his personal integrity matches the poor services in which his shop provides.  Truly disappointing .

name: Max G.
text: Great place. Friendly people. Asked for an estimate, best price in town and they pulled my truck in right away. WOULD RECOMMEND TO EVERYONE. And they are open on sundays as well

name: Bobby Saxon
text: I came in with 4 bad tires and not enough cash and Chris and Nate really helped me out. They are very friendly! I had my 8 yr old daughter with me and she gets bored with EVERYTHING!! But they kept her entertained the whole time. She never complained and neither did I. They are AWESOME and affordable!! Thanks guys

name: Meghan Allen
text: So today we blew out a tire. They were already closed but luckily still there. They sold us a tire and also replaced at a discounted price the tire we bought from them last week that my husband had run a nail over with. Amazing. Will definitely use Circle T again. Recomend them to anyone!

name: Rainy Day
text: I bought a tire from them yesterday evening around 4ish. By the time I went to work at 8 the next morning it was flat. I got to looking at the tire I had bought and it's dry rotted. It's worse than the tire I had replaced. Also my lugs were not put on tight. Definitely not worth the $60 I spent with them.

text:
Very helpful. Good people work here. They have a good tire shop great service 10/10 recommended.
-selfie

name: Shanila Shelton
text: Great owner, fast service

name: Eddie Dowdell
text: Best prices around..

resp.text: Thanks!

name: J R
text: Took my truck here in Oct of 2020 and they forgot to reconnect the sway bar up front, which I fixed. Then gave them a second chance with my wife's car and just discovered they only replaced 3 of the 5 lug bolts on one wheel. Now I have to buy new lug bolts. Go somewhere else if you want the job done correctly.

resp.text: Our apologies that we did not meet your expectations, not what we want to have happen! I see that we have already opened a customer service ticket, we will be back in touch soon!

name: Amanda
text:
As a woman I can say that I have never had a good experience in places when getting my car serviced.  I am spoken down to, given hidden charges, and just treated with general disrespect.
But this was absolutely not the case coming here. Ricky was incredibly nice and spoke to me like an actual human being. I told him what I needed and what time I needed it done. Not only was it done in the exact time I needed, he called to verify what we discussed and verify the price. He did not try to sell my anything unnecessary. And the price wasn't a penny over what he told me. It was an amazing experience and it will be the only place I get my car serviced for the foreseeable future. Thank you for your respect and impeccable service.

resp.text: Thanks for the stars, Amanda! Glad the team was able to take such great care of you. Take care!

name: Kevin Stephens
text: This review is more for an employee than the store itself. Not to take away from the store, though, the store is great. Tire Tech, Ricky, deserves a large amount of praise. That gentleman works his behind off. Every time I’m in the store, he’s there. Working hard. He’s got a fantastic attitude and a general willingness to help. If someone from Tire Discounters sees this, give that man a raise.

resp.text: Awww, thank you for the 5-star review and the kind comments Ricky. We are so glad you had a great experience Kevin, we do what we do for customers just like you. Please come back and see us again when you need us and stay safe out there!

name: Claire Tomlin
text:
Fantastic service! They helped me with my tire issue and Ima go back to them for all my tire needs!

Pros: Honest and down to earth; easy to talk to!

Cons: a bit standoffish at first but it may have been the weather (Torrential downpour)

resp.text: That’s how we rock so you can roll Claire! Thank you for the feedback and 5-star review! We work hard to provide you with a great experience. Please come back to see us again when you need us. Stay safe out there!

name: William Swinson
text: Joseph the manager and his staff have been phenomenal. Great prices and the service is simply outstanding. He and his team helped me solve a major problem that 2020+ Ram 1500 have major complaints about due to tire shimmy at certain speeds. They fixed the entire problem by performing a “dynamic balancing” splitting the needed weights and road force validation. So these folks saved me from a problem that most folks can’t figure out. Truck runs smooth as silk now and these guys were a pleasure to work with. I will NEVER NEVER take my vehicles anywhere else. You guys just made me a customer for life. Just so you know, I make a living teaching organizations how to be efficient and “customer-centric” and these guys rock !!!! Thanks guys!!!!! Ed

resp.text: That’s how we roll, William! Glad we were able to take such good care of you. Thanks, and we’ll see you again down the road!

name: Ryan Cass
text: For the last 5 years I’ve been taking my Camry to NTB in Huntsville and they were fine until they started trying to up sell me on stuff I didn’t need and their prices kept going up with the staff becoming less and less friendly too. When Tire Discounters opened up on Winchester road I looked forward to trying them out since they are much closer and after having some work done on my other vehicles I knew this would be the right place to get a fresh set of tires. They had a great sale going on for Pirelli’s and they are driving great, hopefully they maintain their friendly service and good prices because this is where I’ll be going for the life of my new tires.

resp.text: We rock so you can roll! We're the authority in customer service and auto safety, Ryan. See ya in 5000 miles for your 1st of many free lifetime tire care visits. We want to take make sure we take good care of those new puppies.

name: Timothy Wyant
text: Great service.. free tire and break inspection.

resp.text: Thank you for the stars Timothy! We appreciate you being a valued Tire Discounters customer. Take care and we will see ya again when you need us.

name: Lindsey Snipes
text: Had a great experience with “skip the shop”! Everyone I’ve worked with has been very friendly, helpful, and professional. My SUV was well taken care of while in their hands. Best part, I got all my car needs done without leaving work!

resp.text: The Sutton Road location is da bomb! Thank you for the 5-star review, very much appreciated. We are soooo glad that you had a great experience, and glad you liked the "skip the shop" service! Your time is important and we appreciate you being a valued customer. Spread the word and stay safe out there!

name: Regan Olivia
text:
Best Tire shop in the area!! Great customer service! They are super helpful and explain things well!!! They’re great at what they do and they do things quickly! I recommend them to everyone! :)
Thanks tire discounters :)

resp.text: Best customers! Thank you for the kind words, Regan. Take care and we will see ya again when you need us.

name: Kim George
text: Had an emergency today that required purchasing 4 new wheels and 2 new tires. Joseph went above and beyond to help me get what I needed and my car was finished and ready to when I got off work! The entire staff was friendly! I highly recommend Tire Discounters! 5 star service!!

resp.text: That's how we roll! We are the authority in auto safety, Kim. Take care and we will see ya again when you need us.

name: Kyle Gargis
text: Best Shop. You want your vehicle running right and customer service at 5 stars then this location is the stop. Especially if you have Rick handling you vehicles service/repair. Thanks guys.

resp.text: Rick is TOP NOTCH! Happy to have ya in the TD family, Kyle. You've got us for life.

name: Terry Smith
text: Only 1 tech there.  2 went home the day we were there. Who knows why.  We had appt to get a flat fixed and by 1230 we were ready to make earliest appt. Next day.  The woman said we should have made appt anyway.  Well we did... we told her when we walked through the door. So she looked and got pretty nervous.  They got us in ASAP ands we finally got the tire fixed.  Overall we will use our tire discounters on W72 and county line. We were out of town and Hampton Cove was thre closest. Good luck if you use them.

resp.text: Terry, our apologies that we did not meet your expectations, not what we want to have happen! We definitely care about your experience and we'd like to connect to learn more. If you would like to discuss, please send your preferred contact information to support@tirediscounters.com so we can get back in touch with you. Please include a copy of your review for reference, we hope to hear back from you soon! Thank you and stay safe!

name: Madison
text: My day started out with a flat tire on my car. I took my car here and the nice staff at tire discounters did not hesitate to fix my tire for me! 10/10 would be back again.

resp.text: That’s how we rock so you can roll Madison! Thank you for the feedback and 5-star review! We work hard to provide you with a great experience. Please come back to see us again when you need us. Stay safe out there!

name: Dan Nguyen
text: Awesome service! The staff is very  quick, attentive and professional. They patched my SUV for FREE and cleaned the wheels. We were just about to head out for a road trip so this was great. I'll definitely be coming back when those tires need to be replaced.

resp.text: Rockin' and rollin'! Glad we could keep ya rollin' safely, Dan. Hope you enjoyed your trip and we'll see ya again when ya need us.

name: Stefanie Terrell
text: Do not take your vehicle here unless you’d like something coincidentally to happen requiring an additional repair. My husband took his vehicle here for a tire patch which resulted in him being told he needed new tires due to uneven wear. He received a quote and agreed to pursue the new tire service. During service, he was told that his alignment was extremely off; although he had taken his vehicle to the dealership for routine maintenance. They drove his vehicle to our house (courtesy drop-off) and didn’t even mention that the vehicle was making a grinding noise when accelerating and slowing down (4WD issue). Deceitful and dishonest. Their management told my husband that this was a coincidence and a known issue with the make and model of his vehicle. Then proceeded to give him a quote to repair. BUYER BEWARE

resp.text: We have strict policies in place to never oversell unnecessary items and follow MAP guidelines when making any product or service recommendations. We would like to connect you with a TD Rep to learn more and address your concerns, Stefanie. Would you mind sending your preferred contact information to tirediscounters.com/contact? We look forward to connecting.

name: Seth Cole
text: Very convenient. They picked up car and dropped it off at no expense. Staff was very courteous. We will be repeat customers.

resp.text: Skip the Shop is AWESOME, right?! So glad you were able to take advantage of that service, Seth. Take care and we'll be here anytime ya need us.

name: Joseph Torchia

text: Do not take your vehicle here unless you’d like something coincidentally to happen requiring an additional repair. My husband took his vehicle here for a tire patch which resulted in him being told he needed new tires due to uneven wear. He received a quote and agreed to pursue the new tire service. During service, he was told that his alignment was extremely off; although he had taken his vehicle to the dealership for routine maintenance. They drove his vehicle to our house (courtesy drop-off) and didn’t even mention that the vehicle was making a grinding noise when accelerating and slowing down (4WD issue). Deceitful and dishonest. Their management told my husband that this was a coincidence and a known issue with the make and model of his vehicle. Then proceeded to give him a quote to repair. BUYER BEWARE

text: My daughter was on the interstate on the way home from AU for the holidays when she started rapidly losing tire pressure. She pulled off the interstate at the next exit which was Tuskegee and luckily we were finally able to find this place. I called ahead and they were waiting for her and got to work on her car immediately knowing she was trying to get home (4 hours away) before dark. They quickly checked all tires to make sure they had no leaks, determined it was from the weather, filled them up and rotated them for next to nothing. Thank goodness for these good and kind people, my baby will be home safe and soon! I highly recommend for good honest service.

name: Stephanie Foster
text:
We Saturday at 4:59pm ( yes it was closing time on a Saturday night) we called over to this place, explained to them what was going on we limped to their parking lot we were told they did not have the tire and that they were closed. Just as we were pulling in Mike, the manager was coming out of the garage (while calling other locations to see if they had the tire size we needed) to let us know what he had already done in 60 seconds!!!! After getting Mike the correct tire size, that he had in stock, he was pulling us in to get the old tire off and new tire on. Scott kept us company and checked us out! These guys were able to get us in and out and back on the road quickly! Despite it being closing time on a Saturday night Mike and Scott were there to provide outstanding customer service, quick action and a can do attitude!  Thank you guys again for everything!

Johnny Lavalais

name: Sean Copenhaver
text:
So there I was, just dropped the kids off at school with minutes to spare, running a little behind on my way into work, and with my tire low on air the entire time! It truly felt like a Monday indeed. The caution light erupts to life on my dashboard nearly blinding me, my rear driver side tire...is low on air. *Que dramatic music*
I pull into the nearest mechanic shop and park right in front of the first available bay. They were all open and currently being mopped by the staff. Before I have a chance to throw the car in park, there is a young man walking my way. With the car now in park, I step out of the car and he greets me with a warm smile and a "Good Morning to ya, what can we help with?", but before I have a chance to open my mouth he whistles in shock at the sight of my tire. When I turn around to see the damage, there it is, staring me in the face like a angry mother-in-law when you make an inappropriate joke at the dinner table, a screw.
Now there's two men attending to my car. Courtney, the first-responder, and Lamar, the muscle. The elect to change out the tire and find what they have in stock. 2 good conversation and half a cup of cheap coffee later I've got keys in my hand and ready to start my day. I made it to work on time too for anyone who was wondering.

resp.text: We are so appreciative for you sharing your story. These guys really do work hard to try to be a positive impact in people's lives. Some may say, "you guys just change oil." but we like to say, "we're not just changing oil, we're changing lives!" we strive to be the best 10 minutes in a customers day. thank you for your business and we are so grateful again for your kind words.

name: Ernest G Waters
text: Update to previous review.  Since my initial visit to the McGee rd service facility back in December,  which did an excellent job, I have had 2 bad experiences.  1st bad experience was with my wife's car. She had the oil changed at the eastern blvd facility.  Approximately 1 week later her car's check engine light came on and the fault was for dirty oil. She had the oil checked at a local change facility and it was a quart low. They did another oil change, and I have the filter from that change and it is not as clean a filter as you think from 1 week previous. I had also gotten my oil changed in my truck a few days after she did at the eastern Blvd facility.  So I decided to take a look at my oil and filter. The filter on my truck had an install date written on it from the McGee Rd facility of 12/9/19. The date I first got Express to change it. They supposedly changed my oil and filter on 2/7/20 at McGee rd. I will also attach a pic of the filter . Needless to say this is a very bad way to run a business.  Engine damage from dirty oil is very significant possibility from these action.

resp.text: Hi there, Ernest. While we never like for a customer to leave unsatisfied, feedback like this helps us grow as a company. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We value your business and would love to address your concerns as quickly as possible. When you have time, please leave us your contact information as well as the details you provided here at https://www.expressoil.com/contact/ so we can work to resolve your issue. Thank you!

name: rtc
text:
Went in for new shocks and coils, they installed them well, but when I started driving, my vehicle constantly pulled to the left. If I didn't hold the steering wheel tight it would have flipped at high speeds. So I called them and they swore they had done an alignment. I asked if they'd check again to make sure it was done right and they begrudgingly said yes. Took it back in, they said everything looked great. I drove it off the lot and there was still a severe pull to the left. They blamed my tires and said it's because they had a bad wear pattern. (My tires were only a few months old).

So I took it to another place on the other side of the river. They did an alignment and told me that whoever had done my previous alignment lied to me. They showed me on a print out how the camber was over an inch out of line and how the toe of one wheel was turned too far in. I drove off the lot and my vehicle drove as straight as an arrow.

Bacon Alignment lied to me twice and charged me for something they didn't do. Avoid.

name: Scarlett Dolbear
text: I hate this place. I bought my car from them in 2014. It was a 2012 Nissan rogue. They were over priced compared to other dealers, and the service department is terrible. For instance, I had my oil changed and they did an inspection that is routine. They gave me the sheet showing everything they had checked, to include the tread on my tires. A couple of weeks after this inspection and maintenance my tire almost blew out. It was in terrible condition for some unknown reason with no blame attributed to them because yeah it happens. They told me they could have me a new tire in 24 hrs. So, I agreed. They also added that it would be in my best interest to replace all four tires because the rest of them were in such terrible condition as well. Now, why would they have checked the tread on my tires less than two weeks prior and marked them good if they were in terrible condition?? So, I obliged and told them I would just order four new tires. But, I also told them I wanted to keep the old ones just in case I needed a spare. When I came back to pick up my car it did have new tires. I asked where I could pick up the old ones because my fiance at the time told me to keep them, and they assured me that I didn't want them. One guy, I'm guessing the supervisor, even included that his wife wouldn't be driving around on tires in that bad of shape. So, lesson learned: they will try and take advantage of you in any way they can when it comes to getting the most money out of you. I left without my old tires and to top it all off they even charged me a recycling fee for them after I told them I wanted to keep them. I went back not too long ago and the service was just the same. My AC had went out on this same car. Long story short, they charged me a diagnostic fee and couldn't even tell me exactly what was wrong, but worse case scenario I was looking at $2000 worth of repairs. So, after the tire incident I went elsewhere and got a second opinion. They took less time and narrowed the issue down to a relay problem. But, told me worse case scenario $1500. So, again they are over priced. I ended up trading my car in at a dealership in Bay minette and I couldn't be happier. I purchased the extended warranty on the rogue with them, and it served no purpose. It ran out at 100,000 miles and every issue i had either wasn't covered  or started at 104,000 miles. Another lesson learned. I will not shop with them again, or use their service department for anything to include routine maintenance. I don't recommend them to anyone. Of course this is just my opinion of them from what I experienced.

They called down to another Express Oil Change 10 miles away who had one for us. Instead of putting our young family on a spare tire in an area we didn’t know, they drove down and got the tire for us and changed it there. They had us back on the road in about an hour and half. While I don’t know when we will be back through, I will forever be grateful for their kindness, and professionalism and highly recommend them if you are traveling through.

name: Britt Noelle
text: I happened to be traveling through Calera on my way home, and unfortunately got a flat tire. It was the perfect storm of bad timing, incredibly delayed roadside service, and the literal annoyance of cold and rainy weather. I looked up tire mechanics in the area and happened upon these guys. After a couple of calls to let them know i was still awaiting a tow truck, we realized I might not even make it to them before closing time. And on top of that, if it was deemed that I did need a new tire, they might not have what I needed. It was at this point that the managers asked me where I was located! Wyatt and Sam actually drove to where I was, helped me put my spare tire on, and assisted me safely to the shop. They were busy, and still took incredible care of me. I truly can't thank the team there enough. The customer service is off the charts. Everyone was personable and kind, the shop itself is clean and orderly, and they got me taken care of super fast! Honestly, I am just so thankful to have encountered such a great team. Its too bad I'm not a local, but I'm very thankful that it was in Calera that my tire blew. :) THANKS AGAIN Y'ALL!!

resp.text: Hi, Britt, thank you for the positive feedback! Our team here at Express Oil Change & Tire Engineers is always happy to service your vehicle, and we’re thrilled to hear the customer service was stellar. We look forward to continuing to do business with you in the future!

text:
i went out to get lunch and noticed my tire was low, so i stopped into the calera location. i pulled in to the parking lot and sat for several minuets and no one came out to great me. so i decided to pull behind one of the bays and wait. after the car in the bay was guided out, they guided my in. i told them i needed my tire pressure checked and after checking them he said one was very low and that i probably needed a patch. i asked how long it would take  (since i just got lunch and needed to take it home to the family)
he told me 20 min. an hour and a half later, no one even came to tell me it was taking a little longer and at one point a customer pulled into the lot and almost drove into the bay because no one was in the oil change area. the driver got out and walked into the waiting room and asked "where are all the employees" i told her i had not seen anyone in a while, she got back in her car and left. terrible customer service.

resp.text: Hi Jamie, we’re sorry you were dissatisfied with our staff and experience during your service. We value your business and would love to address your concerns as quickly as possible. Please visit us at www.expressoil.com/contact/ and leave your contact information, as well as the details of your experience, so we can work to resolve your issue. Thank you.

name: Simply Alluring
text: DO NOT TAKE YOUR CAR HERE!!! My mother took her car in to change a tire. They couldn’t get the tire sensor light to go off and asked her to leave it overnight. She called several times and was told they’d review the cameras and call her back...that was 3 days ago. Shop with them at your own risk!

text: I was met by Regina, a sweet young lady behind the counter, and i told her what i needed. She and i walked to my truck to see what the exact size tire i needed. I told her to set me up with her recommendations and i handed her the keys and they immediately started the process of mounting my tires. Everyone was awesome,  very polite and made me feel right at home. Thanks to the whole crew there for the prompt attention and new shoes for my truck! I definitely recommend these guys!

name: Donald Fields
text: Listen.......don’t take your car to any of T Walker Enterprise places. It’s sad how that man handles people. His reputation is not the best and it’s sad when you explain a problem you’ve had and everyone that hasn’t dealt with the owner has a NASTY taste about him. Take your car elsewhere. Many of the places will lie, but to the extreme HE WONT HELP FIX THEIR MESS UP. Don’t settle. Keep all your receipts and make sure that you document EVERY MOVE! Ive had THE WORST EXPERIENCE. Goodyear should be ASHAMED to have him under their franchise. My girlfriend and I are just so frustrated.

name: Njomza Hasani
text: I don't know where to begin I am  shocked and disgusted with the customer service received from this place.I have never been one to leave a bad review but if I could I would leave - star reviews.One of our trucks from the business was experiencing some issues so we brought it in for them to look at it.They told us that the fuel pump needed to be replaced and gave us a quote on it.We  decided to go with them even though it was way above what others quoted.Keep in mind they told us what they were sure was wrong with the truck.Few days later the give us a call stating that the turbo on the truck went out and said that in all it would be 15k parts and labor included, but they reassured  that after this it wouldn't have any more issues, a few days  go they work on the truck tell us to come pick it up that it was ready for us to take it back out on the road that everything was fixed and we didn't have anything to worry about.We drive pick up the truck 200miles after leaving the shop the truck goes out again.We decided to give to owner a call and told him that we just spent 15k on them preparing the issues his response was hanging up on a customer that spent that amount on fixing the issues that he reassured that the complications were fixed, with that being said I would not trust an owner of a business that takes 15k from a hard working family and hangs up when a customer calls to tell them they are having the same issues he supposedly fixed.He didn't fix the issues correctly and instead of trying to resolve the issues cuz I understand we are only human we make mistakes but the way he went about it was all wrong.You sir will be hearing from my lawyer !!

resp.text: I’m sorry for any problems we may have caused you. I understand your friend Leart Hasani ask you to post a negative review on our business because he is upset his truck is having problems. I can assure you that we are working with him to get his problem resolved. I have been in contact with him the last two days and we are trying to figure out his problem. We are not doing him wrong. Thanks and God Bless

text: I can think of 3 times you guys (all under the watchful eye of Chase) have come to my rescue in less than years time.  The first time I brought my car in for tires and ya'll looked it over and pointed out things that needed to be fixed and helped me map out a timeline as well.(many garages would tell ya it all had to be done right then).  Second time through trial and error we got my A/C up and running. Then most recently I found my self having to make frequent trips to bham and my car started overheating.  You guys got it right in and fixed that too!!!  Just got back from Bham and not once did it even act like it was thinking about over heating.  HEROS I tell ya!!!!!!  You guys rocks.  Thank you so much.  See ya in 3 months for my next oil change!!!!

text: Went into roadmart because my brakes were squealing really bad and all the other places was charging 300 and over for pads and rotors and i wasn't able to afford the cost.  roadmart did the job for a far cheaper price and did a very nice job.   Their mechanic with the name of gene was personable and friendly and described everything very well.    i would certainly go back no questions asked

text: 5 stars to Roadmart ! Thank you so much for your great service, great prices and honesty today !

text: You will not find more professional or experienced staff anywhere else. Absolutely satisfied every time.

name: Sierra Eutsey
text: I've been coming to RoadMart for two years now and I am now having the worst time with them. I brought my car in a week ago because the front end of the car was not driving properly. RoadMart said that they could not replicate the issue but they did see I needed my tires balanced, I let them balance my tires and when I left I was having the same issues. I brought my car back and then they said the tires were  separating on the inside, so I paid 367 for four brand new tires. Replacing the tires only helped the car drive smoother but the problem was now worse! So I brought my car back today and now there saying that the back tires are the cause of the front tires shifting and that wasn't something they could fix, I would have to take it to the dealership. The guy said he could try to align the front to see if that would help but it made the issue even worse then when I had initially brought the car in. I am now sitting here after closing hours so they can set my alignment back to were it was. I just feel like if they were unable to repair the car in the first place then they should've said so instead of me coming out of 446 dollars for no reason. I asked if I could a refund for the alignment and the guy said that he wouldn't be able to refund me, would have to wait until next call and ask for a refund or he could credited as two free oil changes which is not acceptable for my inconvenience

name: George “Stovie” Moore
text: I find Hoover, Alabama Costco’s tire service to be sleazy and misleading.  They say they will warranty tires for a certain time period but the fine print lays out a myriad of conditions upon which they deny your claim. Further, the free tire rotation you get if you buy tires from Costco takes about a half day to get done. It’s not even feasible to get any type of tire service from Costco in Hoover Alabama because they are so terrible at servicing your vehicle in a timely manner that you lose a half day’s wages. Costco is dishonest and misleading when it comes to tires.

name: Erica Disbrow
text: Lambert was so nice, professional, and caring! I came to get a small hole patched, and he saw a defect in my tire and replaced it with a brand new one for FREE! As a 25 year old girl in grad school he very well could have taken advantage of the situation and charged me for the tire (or even labor) and he didn't. He showed me pictures of the defect, and he said he just didn't feel comfortable with me driving on it even though it didn't seem to alter my driving at all. I really appreciate the thoroughness and professionalism of their work! I will definitely be going back!

name: Roy Martin
text: I needed new tires and Costco's price was $400 less than any other quotes that I got.  Installation was easy and I thought Costco did a great job.

name: Ed Stakes
text: I had a tire with very low pressure last Sunday. Drove up to the tire garage, and Marcus took care of it right away.....a sharp and very nice employee.

name: Gaurav Jain
text: As always, the tire center at this Costco was a disappointment. I took an appointment for Noon, and was there for almost 70 minutes. The employees have a constant look of frustration and burnout on their faces, and that reflects in their dealings with customers. Never called me about the car being done, and remain unapologetic. The customer is treated like a liability, which is surprising for a shop that charges you a membership to be an "elite customer". Makes me wonder if the 100 dollar savings are worth a visit the next time around.

name: S N
text: I had a great experience ordering my tires and the service and expertise was just as you’d expect from Costco.

name: Brent Arnold
text: Usually a quick experience getting them to service my tires. Great prices and nice workers.

name: Virginia H.
text: Tire pressure indicator light came on and we showed up at Costco at a little after 5pm.  Lambert (I hope I got his name right...) checked our tire pressure for us, found a screw, and took care of the repair for us even though it was really close to closing time.  He was SO nice and sweet!  Thanks Lambert!

name: D F
text: Used the website to purchase tires. Had an issue where the website made it look like there was a 50k mile treadwear warranty when there really wasnt. I talked to Alexander in the Tire Dept. and showed him how confusing the information on the website was, and he took it from there. He talked with a few members of management and made it right. He was very professional (and helpful) and made a situation where i feared i was just stuck into a very pleasant customer service interaction. Thank you

name: Sommer Pugh
text: If I could give Zero, I would. Order my tires online 9 days ago. I cut a tire and decided to buy a whole new set. They arrived at Costco at 5:19am (based on the online tracking), it took me calling from 10:30 am to 2pm for someone to tell me they were actually there. Got there at 4:15pm, around 2 hours later they called to tell me that the lug nuts on my 2014 Ford Escape were swollen. My husband is a mechanic by trade. He had already put the spare on before we arrived and had seen the condition of the lug nuts, which looked fine. They told me that I would need to buy their lug nuts. My husband walked to the tire department and asked them to show him the issue. It took the guy 8 lug nuts to find one that was a little snug on the socket. My husband was furious. From what we have heard they use the term "swollen" lug nuts alot and conviently always have plenty of their lug nuts on hand. Oh and the tech had the nerve to say that he could use my Ford lug nuts, but that would put more work on him. With that being said, they put their lug nuts on my vehicle for their convenience not my satisfaction. But I did get back my perfectly good Ford lug nuts for husband to put back on when we get home. Oh and the kicker is they ran my car battery down and preceded to tell us we needed to replace the batteries in both of our keys.

name: J Lang
text: For someone that only service tires this place is a joke. They started out really good with service and products. Products are still good you just can't get to them. Even if you walk in it takes forever for someone to come out to service you. They NEVER answer the phone , if by chance they do answer expect a long hold. Then it takes weeks and sometimes a month to get an appointment, just to get your tires rotated. They need more garages and more help. After my last set of tires wore out I went to NTB, They have longer hours and are way easier to get to. Now waiting on the tires on my husband's care to be replaced so we can be finished with them!!!!

name: Lazlow Wandschneider
text: We only buy tires at Costco. And we always have our tire work done at the one in Huntsville. It's further than Hoover but the service is much better.

name: Tyson Goodrich
text: Wish I would have checked the reviews here before buying. Beware! Do not buy tires and try to walk in for installation if you value your time. I got there as the store opened at 10 am and they didn't start installation until 4 pm. When I called to make an appointment the "next available" wasn't for 3 weeks. Hopefully those who get appointments get serviced sooner, but I'm not sure they do by the way it is being run. What kind of business plan is this bad these days!? Save your time and go ANYWHERE else. It'll be worth it in time saved. Promise.

name: Robert Martin
text: Terrible service, clerk setting up a purchase of some tires when phone rang and left me hanging while she gave all her attention to the caller inquiring about tires.  I was there in person and she left me and 4 other person in line and gave the phone call priority.  How rude is that.  I left my Costco card with her and told her to keep it, because I want be back.

text: The Tire Center apparently does not have the facility and manpower to handle the business that they get in a timely manner.  Phone "waits", as noted by others are very long to never answered.  And, waits for an appointment to install tires are very long; it took me 3 weeks to get an appointment to get my tires installed after I ordered them online and made an appointment in the store the next day after placing the order.  I probably should have taken my tire business elsewhere, but we love the rest of our store experiences at this Costco.

text: The earlier reviews are very accurate. Worst tire customer service. Never ever even think of going here for buying or getting your tire repair.

name: Jessica Anne Aradan
text: We did not have a good experience. I needed a simple tire patch & after an hour of waiting they stated "they noticed the tire was not a brand they sold & they couldn't patch it based on the locating of the nail". The nail seemed to be @ the threshold & the attendant was confident it couldn't be patched bc it was too unsafe.  I tried talking with them about putting a plug in, but they seemed determined to sell me a new tire to replace my new 5 month old tire. They took my tire off & put the spare tire on without asking since they were planning on ordering me a new tire. I asked them to put the tire back on since I wanted to get a second opinion to get it patched & they refused. I ended up driving to the closest Discount Tire & they fixed my tire in 5 minutes. BHAM needs a Discount Tire.

name: Shawn Michael
text:
In a word.....Awful.

Ordered online. 10 days to ship. Tried for days to get someone to answer the phone- never happens.  It just rings and rings then disconnects.  Finally called as soon as they opened and someone answered!!!....”please hold” and call then disconnected.

Went in person.  Service tech and manager argued in front of me for awhile.  Offered me a date 10 days later to install.  Pretty much lost imy temper   I said just give me the tires and I’ll install them somewhere else.

Reply: “Oh- we can do it today”.....

I’m sure these guys make minimum wage.  They don’t care if you are happy or not.  They are leading miserable lives and want to make you miserable too.  I would advise any potential customers to stay away.

name: Shefali Patel
text: Worst communication and customer service I have ever experienced. After a week of waiting for my "special order" tire to come in and not hearing any response I called four times and finally got a hold of somebody. I later was told that my tire was discontinued and couldn't be ordered however the technician blamed it on the tire company saying that they were never told it was discontinued. No apology .They finally said they would give me the model closest similar to that tire and said to come on i! since they had it in stock already. Upon arriving a different technician told me that they had to special order that tire and the technician I spoke to was on lunch and I would have to wait thirty minutes to get some clarity. The lack of organization, communication and customer service is shocking. I will never come here again . So much time wasted and I left feeling dumber by association.

text: We know the family that owns and has owned and operated this establishment for three generations. They are the salt of the earth! Their associates are equally special as they work to diagnose and resolve your automobile/truck issues efficiently, accurately and economically. This is a place where we would continue to take our vehicles for service even if we didn't know the family. We, like many, many others come from far away to avail ourselves of their service. name: Chanse LaShai
text:
Couple years back, brought in my vehicle and asked them to check over everything to make sure it would be good for a 1500 mile journey. They only took 30 minutes, topped my fluids, and sent me on my way with the all-clear. Went elsewhere for a second opinion and they were shocked that Gill's blatantly missed (or didn't even check) that I had some serious suspension issues as well as separating tires.

Fast forward to earlier this year. Boyfriend's new car had a clutch failure. Ordered a conversion kit online to do ourselves. After not being able to put it back together it was brought to Gill's. It turned out the company we ordered from sent us the wrong kit. Gill's said it would be a week or so. After hearing nothing, had to call and see where progress was, got some excuse about why it wasn't done yet. Okay, not a big deal but should have been kept up to date. Week after week of not being kept up to date, and hearing excuse after excuse as to why, 2 months later car is ready. Car feels great, except for a weird rumbling sensation that wasn't there before. Oh well, not sure what it is. Notice a bolt just sitting in the console that wasn't there before. Turns out they didn't even connect the steering column. Thank goodness it didn't give out and KILL US while driving down 280 for the week we couldn't figure out the rumbling/random bolt. Won't ever return, and will always warn people from here on out.

name: Ecleave Summer
text: On March 1, 2019 about 9:30am my mom purchased a tires which was mounted and balanced. After she started up her truck she noticed that her brake light and abs light were both on. He said that it was nothing that they had done. She proceeds to back out and heard a noise. So immediately she knew something was wrong. She drove to the Oil change place about 200ft away. The went looked at the tire and told her that her studs were broken and that she should return where she had the tire put on. At this point the tire is riding so bad she had it towed to a shop. Where it inspected and found broke studs and a broken abs line. Contacted T-town and he said that is guys didn’t do it. To make a long story short watch while people are working on your cars. My mom could have been hurt. You got your money for your tire but it cost more to repair her truck.

resp.text: My manager made me aware of the situation.  He explained everything very carefully and gave a demonstration on how it was impossible for them to have damaged the ABS line.  I have viewed the security tapes several times from 3 different angles and I am 100% positive we did not break any studs and we certainly did not cut an abs line.  If you would like to arrange a time to meet and view the footage yourself please contact me personally.

name: three dollar hands
text: Stay away. Thet put tires on with impact gun = broken lug studs later down the road. Oh and the tire went flat!!!!

resp.text: I'm very sorry you had a bad experience.  I wish you would have contacted someone at the shop and they could have helped you with your problem.  Having been in the tire business for 15 years I can assure you that an impact gun is a safe way to put wheels back on the car.  It is true that old wheel studs can break, especially on older cars.    We do our best to advise our customers on where they can go to get their worn out studs replaced.  We can even order this $2 part for you at Auto Zone.  What's great about our tires is every one is air tested before it arrives in Tuscaloosa and then we check it again in a dunking tank before we put it on your car.  I know how easy it is to run over debris in Tuscaloosa with all the construction.  We have done 35 repairs in a single day before!  That is why we offer a 30 day warranty on all tires.  Even if you run over something!  Whenever you have a problem please call the manager and I assure you all your tire problems will be solved.

name: Tiffany Busby
text: Saturday afternoon (4/3/21) I pulled in there to purchase a used tire for my Buick.  The staff was friendly enough, but the price was a little steep $51.50 but, I paid it because I was in need. Drove straight home from there. (about 3miles). Woke up Sunday morning and it was flat. Aired it up enough to get it back up there Monday morning..  When I got there and tell them the problem they took the tire off and said my valve stem was bad and charged me $20 to replace the valve stem. I thought all was good, woke up Tuesday morning it was flat again. I called & spoke to Chris who told me that it was more than likely a cracked rim and there was nothing he could do about it. Today...FRIDAY, I took off work to take my car to Fortners. They first told me that the tire was the wrong size. Then when they got it off the rim they showed me 4 plugs where the tire had been repaired 4 times, previously. For $30 I got an almost perfect Firestone tire, that was the right size with alot of tread. The actions and unprofessionalism at Chris Tires/Havana Tires was ridiculous and I intend to call the BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU.

name: Kathryn Davis
text: I had a trip to Birmingham the next day to take my daughter to her surgery follow up appointment, so I came in the night before to purchase four good used tires. There were only two employees working at the time an I guess they got overwhelmed because more people were in need of service; mind you I was the first customer an they should have been working on my car, but the guy kept stopping to help other people that had pulled up. So finally I had enough an asked the guy to please finish with my car, because I had to go rest before getting on the road (at that time I had been there close to 2 hours). So he did, an I was on my way. We made it through Montgomery without any problems, an then I was awaken by a loud noise, screeching tire sounds, and the sight of my front driver tire rolling away parallel to my truck, heading towards the grassy median. By the grace of God we were not hurt. The inside of the rim was shredded, the bolts were gone, the studs ate up. All this was caused by the a negligent employee that didn't properly tighten the bolts to secure the tire. I spoke with the owner about getting help, but none was offered, an he even tried placing the blame somewhere else. But I will never give Chris Tires anymore of my money/business nor will I recommend them to anyone. I spent over $600 to have my car fixed. I even checked the other tires an the bolts were not secure on them either. Lesson learned, u can't support everyone. I hate that I have to give them one 🌟😡 cause they don't deserve that.

text: Went in to have air checked. They were very helpful and had air checked in a very timely manor. Their waiting room was clean and comfortable. I will go back when I need tires replaced.

resp.text: Linda, thank you for choosing us to inspect your vehicle's A/C. We are proud to deliver a comfortable and professional auto service experience for our customers and we look forward to seeing you when you are ready for those tires!

name: John Petit
text: To anyone in the Foley, Gulf Shores and Orange Beach area who needs engine repair, please strongly consider Fausak.  I gave them 5 stars and took the time to write a review and here is why.  They performed the service review on my 2015 Toyota Avalon with 70K miles and it was missing badly and seemed like a coil pack problem.  The original diagnosis and estimate came in around $650.  I gave them the verbal to proceed and they called back an hour and half later to tell me that their original diagnosis was incorrect and that they found the problem.  A beach mouse/rodent chewed the fuel line to one of the cylinders and the bill would be $136 parts and labor.  I was overjoyed and consider that an incredible testimony to their honesty and integrity.  I will do business with them whenever I can in the future and I recommend them highly.

resp.text: John, we appreciate you sharing your experience. It is important to our business to treat our customers with respect and honesty when it comes to their auto repair needs. Thank you for coming to us with your Toyota Avalon and we look forward to working with you next time!

name: Mike Cents
text: Matt from Fausak is our go-to guy. His team of mechanics is amazing. Matt consistently has a great attitude and always tries to help no matter the issue at hand. Do yourself a favor and acquaint yourself with Fausak.

resp.text: Mike, we are proud to have a staff that delivers high quality repairs and experiences for our customers. Thank you for leaving us this feedback and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Tony Chapman
text: Stopped by without an appointment due to a tire on my travel trailer losing air. We were greeted and immediately taken into a bay for service, the technician quickly discovered the problem and the tire was repaired and mounted. Very professional service writers and technicians ×ith a new and modern facility. We were back on the road to continue our vacation all within an hour.  Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, Tony. It was our pleasure to quickly diagnose the issue with your trailer tire and get you back on your vacation in no time!

name: Joan Harris
text: My son got a nail in his tire, and it went flat on the interstate in Mississippi.  When he changed his tire to the spare, he broke the stud that holds the lug nut on.  With some calling and stress, I got him to our vacation spot in Orange beach.  I called Fausak and talked to Raymond (who was very kind). They were so accommodating, fixed his tire, and even found another nail in another tire and fixed it.  They did it quick and we were back to our vacation within an hour.  I highly recommend this place.

resp.text: It was our pleasure to take care of the punctured tires on your son's vehicle and get your family back to your vacation! We appreciate you sharing this experience and if there are any auto repair or tire services we can assist with in the future, just let us know!

name: M. Tyler Arthur
text: Stopped in to check a deflated tire and was told a ( perfectly fine otherwise) tire cannot be repaired/plugged more than once. Upon a quick search - this isn't the case at all! Fausak will not see my cars again. Honesty and trust are most important to me and was let down on both fronts.

resp.text: Mr. Arthur,  Thank you for reaching out to us and pointing out our miscommunication.  Your tire had a puncture that was too close to a prior repair and together the repairs would have overlapped.  This makes the tire unsafe to repair according to the Tire Industry Association and the US Tire Manufacturers Association.  Our top priority is the safety of all our guests and employees, and ultimately every other car on the road.  We failed to explain these guidelines accurately which led to the misunderstanding and for that we apologize.  We have sent a copy of the excerpts from each of these guidelines to you.   If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to reviews@fausaktire.com or call the Foley store.  Thank you.

name: Milly Brent
text: I've always used this place to replace my tires. They've always been really nice, and helpful. Recently I got my tire changed and the guy was super rushed because we came at closing. Which I totally understand being frustrated with us for coming in so late, but I think he left the wheel cover off my wheel. We were also in a rush, so we didn't pay a whole lot of attention. When we got to our destination we noticed the wheel cover wasn't on the tire he had changed. We called and they said they didn't have it there. I drove by to ask them if they had found it yet and they said it must have fallen off when we were driving. My boyfriend says he remembers the cover not being put back on, but he was in such a hurry that it didn't really register. I think maybe it was broken or lost there and someone didn't want to be responsible. They're cheap covers though, and I would not have been mad. I just feel like they should have offered some sort of compensation or a discount on my next tire or something because I was obviously disgruntled about the situation. The only way my cover would have fallen off would be if it wasn't put back on right. I wasn't accusatory or abrasive when I went to see if they had found it. The situation definitely could have been handled better though. I unfortunately will not be back to them.

name: Leslie Brown
text: I knew something had changed in my tire. I checked this tire routinely and, this morning, discovered it had a tear with exposed belt. Due to the size of the tear and where I was in town were the key factors in where I went today.  I had to take care of it because for all I knew, there was a chance I was NOT going to be able to make it to any of my  destinations. The guys at A&A in Muscle Shoals helped me while they were in the process of packing stuff to move to their Florence Blvd. location and had me fixed up within 20-30 minutes. That included changing the tire and rotating/balancing the other three. 👍👍 from this lady!

name: Barry Cox
text: I needed two used tires fast and they took care of me quick

name: Dustin Coan
text: In and out at a reasonable price. The only down side is not much room.

name: Bryan Ramirez
text: Showed up right before closing time (called the store to let them know we were coming). They had no customers currently being attended. I took one of my spare tires to get replace with a used tire. The guy proceeded to ring me up and gave me the total for it. They tried to charge me $40 something dollars for a used tire. My friend who was with me pulled out his phone to get some price matches with new tires at Walmart and other locations but the guy rudely says "I don't have time for that". We were in total dis'believe. Horrible!!

name: Nicole Duke
text: Terrible.  Unprofessional.  Rude.  Con artists.

text: I just want to say thank you so much to Doug and his daughter Crystal! They provided a1 customer service I'm so sad that I live in Nashville and I was just passing through but I'm so thankful that these were the people that I encountered during this time. Times like these remind you of why we all need to stick together. Thank you Doug and Crystal and pups💛💛

name: Denise Vivian
text:
We were traveling back home to Indiana from Florida and experienced terrible vibration on trailer. We exited I65 to troubleshoot. Googled tire store in vicinity and we were at truck stop right next door  to Dodge City tire store. We pulled in and they got to work immediately.

We had 2 bad tires about to pop.
Within 1 hour we were back on the road with all new tires, balanced and installed at a good price. We were lucky they  didn't blow out on the road. Sheer luck we found this store  who does honest work, no price gouging for travelers. No pressure,  just honest people.
Very clean store with friendly staff
Would use them again. And they are dog people too (extra points for us)
Believe the good reviews you read!

name: Ameleigh Bippen
text: We were headed to the beach and got a flat tire. Not being from the area, we were worried, but when we found this place, they took care of us. They had us in and out with a new tire within 15 minutes. Super nice staff that worked quickly to get us back on the road. I would definitely recommend Dodge City!

text: Truly, I can't say enough nice things about this shop.  They are trustworthy, friendly, helpful, and reasonably priced.  They genuinely care about their customers, and they will give you honest advice about your vehicle.  I'm so glad we found them!

name: Joe Westbay
text: Great place. Fast friendly service. With fair prices. Fixed us up and had us back on the road in minutes. Even wished a safe trip back to indiana. Good people.

name: Kenneth Overton
text: Very good service had appointment at 9:30 out by 1015 oil change and fix brad leak on tire

name: Kevin Bradshaw
text: Driving down the highway at 11:30pm, we had a flat tire and no spare. The wrecker dropped my dog, wife, and I off in front of this shop and left us with our vehicle. We had no access to uber or Lyft and were stranded with no options. As we stayed in our vehicle over night, we wondered how the next morning would go and hoped this shop would be able to take care of us so we could be back on the road. Well 6:45am rolled around and we were honored to meet the owner Doug. This shop doesn’t open until 7:30, and at 6:45, he welcomed us in as he got there early to open shop. Instead of morning opening routines, he got right to our issue instead. He opened the waiting room and bathroom so my wife could freshen up and be comfortable after our joyous night in the vehicle. Doug and one of his workmates took the tire off and had it fixed within 15-20 minutes. They made sure all our tires were aired and ready to roll again. There was even a scheduled costumer there that we kind of got ahead of, and he seemed so nice and not put out that we needed help quickly, and I could tell the owner even treated him like family.  I am beyond impressed with the service and this business. As a fellow business owner, I understand costumer service, and this place has it right. Thank you so much again Doug for getting us on the road quickly, efficiently, and cost effectively. Your business is amazing, and I hope you can serve yourself  vacation sometime soon as well. Thanks again!

name: Daniel Hall
text:
They were very helpful.  I was headed to Birmingham when my check engine light came on so I pulled off the interstate and they checked the code and got me going quickly.

Their shop is conveniently located right by the truck stop so it is easy to get to for those who are traveling on interstate 65 north or south.

name: Blonde Mule
text: Amazing guys! Saved us with 2 blow outs on our camper on our way back home from Florida. Tires in stock and let us hang in the a/c with our little dog.

name: Rosmarie Moghal
text: We too were traveling on I 65 with a leaking tire. What luck to find this tire shop. Devine intervention I say. They quickly patched our tire and we were back on our way. And the cost was more than reasonable. And the friendly service is just superb. Thanks so much.

text: This is an excellent example of a professional work place. The manager (Doug) and the staff are all friendly and knowledgeable. The place is also very nice and clean. One of our cars needed fast service on the way, and these guys' service was nothing short of amazing, at a very reasonable price. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

text: They had my car ready in one day fuel pump went out on my way to work got it towed with my insurance to the Chevron down the street they pulled it to the shop . diagnosed it.ordered part and had it installed it was ready at 9:00 a.m. great staff we even had a laugh out of the situation.they even saved me around 180$ in discounts thanks again

text: We found Dodge City Tire & Lube out of pure desperation, my son's car broke down on his way home from college on I65. Its so nice to deal with people who are so caring and helpful as well as honest, we are grateful for crossing their path, gave us renewed faith in humanity!! Would highly recommend this shop for all your vehicle's needs!

name: Rachel O'Shea
text: We were driving on I 65 South bound, stopped off in a rest stop and realized our back tire had a nail and was leaking at a quick pass.  Luckily for us Dodge City Tire and crew were less then 3 miles away!  Hobbled along on our spare, the guys were friendly, quickly assessed the situation and noted that BOTH back tires had punctures!  After a short cool down in their clean and relaxed waiting area, we were back on our way!  They were able to patch both tires.  With two "out of towners" in a pickle, they could have taken advantage. Can't thank the team enough for the quick, friendly and professional service on such short notice.  We were back on the road within 45 minutes of stopping!!  The offer of Chicago Pizza and beers on us will always be open :)

name: Garrett Smith
text:
I had came in to get a tire changed. Place was packed out, that's cool, I dont mind.
They have the tire I want but can't put it on the day of because of time constraints, that's okay.
The manager, who's name I will withhold, told me that no other tire shop was open that day and I would have to come back on Monday, although I had already came from Walmart TLE and they were changing tires.
I go up the road and to the other Express Oil and tire center. They have my size tire and change it for me.
Now why the manager of this store lied to me on both occasions is beyond me. I can only assume he was trying to save his sales instead of trying to help a brother out.

I'll be going to the Express Oil on 280, instead. There's good people there.

resp.text: Hi Garrett, we’re sorry you were dissatisfied with our staff and experience during your service. We value your business and would love to address your concerns as quickly as possible. Please visit us at www.expressoil.com/contact/ and leave your contact information, as well as the details of your experience, so we can work to resolve your issue. Thank you.

I’ve used express before and always have a good experience, but the sylacauga location leaves a lot to Be desired. 2/5 would not recommend

text:
Went to get new tires mounted and balanced and a front end alignment on my wife's 2011 Chevy Tahoe. Reasonable price for mounting the tires, checked front end and said it was good, so they didn't charge me for it. Not even a dime!!! I told the manager that good service was hard to find now a days, and that I would definitely be passing the word along that these guys are good honest people.

Also, they got my business again with a front end alignment on my truck a few weeks later. Both vehicles are riding smooth and straight. Can't complain at all. Good people and good service!

name: Elizabeth
text: I've gone here a few times now. I went one time and David told me it wasn't time for me to get my oil changed. I'm not used to businesses being that honest. They're fast, affordable, efficient, professional, and polite. What more could you ask for a business?

name: Felicia Lewis
text: I got my oil changed and my brakes checked. They were really nice explained everything they did and why. I was very happy with the service.

text: These guys are wonderful. Very helpful, always meet my expectations, and great price

resp.text: Hi, Tina, thank you for the positive feedback! Our team here at Express Oil Change & Tire Engineers is always happy to service your vehicle, and we’re thrilled to hear the customer service was stellar. We look forward to continuing to do business with you in the future!

name: Ronnie Davison
text:
Had a tire leak fixed person that fixed the tire was very courteous and explained how he fixed the tire. Took very little time. The thing that was very bad was the staff that waited on me and took my money was very unfriendly very poor customer service skills. Will not go back.
Express called me and apologized and sent me a coupon for a free oil change.

resp.text: Our goal is to provide superior service to our customers and to make every experience where you would highly recommend us and trust us with all your car care needs. Please feel free to call our office if you would like to discuss your experience in more detail at 205-884-7384.

resp.text: We really try hard to give every customer assurance that their car is well-maintained with the highest quality automotive parts available by a friendly, professional staff who really care about your car.  We would welcome more details about your experience by calling our Corporate Office at 205-884-7384.

name: Robert Fowler
text: I had all 5 tire pressure monitors replaced at this location in Dec 2017, I was not told there was no guarantee on the monitors after paying $441.00, 2 have since gone bad. I just had a oil change and the service mechanic told me I would have to pay $220 to have defective monitors replaced less then 2.5 years later. This to me is a rip off and had I been told up front that there was no warranty on the monitors I would never had them installed. I like the oil changes here but in the future will look elsewhere for mechanical work.

resp.text: Robert, we are so sorry to hear about the experience you had with us! We never like to leave a customer unsatisfied. Please take a moment to leave us your contact information, along with the details of your concerns you provided here, at https://www.expressoil.com/contact/. We want to reach out to you and address these concerns as soon as possible. Thank you for bringing this to our attention!

text: Since moving here I have been seeking a repair shop.My first encounter and I am tickled pink! 2 new tires and an alignment in about an hour! Greg and crew are knowledgeable and friendly.  I recommend them highly!

text: Jake brought us the much needed gas after Hurricane Sally We were in Orange Beach and he provided the most excellent service !!!    Team Jake!!!

name: Sleep Depot
text: I had taken my car with a nail in the tire to another local shop where I originally had purchased the tires. I was told that my tire couldn't be repaired due to threads being worn too thin, tires needed to be replaced for $900 I was told.. It looked to me like the tires still had some threads left. So I took it to Greg at Good Year who repaired the tire for $14 and confirmed that the tires had plenty left on the threads. Good to see that there are still good people around with integrity. Thanks for the great service!

name: Jeannie Johnson
text: Great service, great people!!

name: Jessica Nix
text: My entire family has been taking our cars here since we moved here almost 20 years ago. I do not trust anyone else with my car. They will always take time to explain things to you but the main thing I love going here is because they are honest people. They will not sell you a service you don't need.

name: Lynn R. Perry
text:
While traveling across country my truck suddenly needed repair.  I asked the tow truck driver  to haul me to Alabama Auto; the driver said this station was an excellent choice.  My truck was towed in the back parking lot at 11:30 PM on a Monday night.  At 7: 00 AM the station open and I was out by 10:00 AM with new front hub bearing assembly.
The people were considerate, and competent throughout the process.  I have basic auto repair knowledge and they added to that by patiently demonstrating and showing me specifically what was wrong and how it would be repaired.
When your traveling having your vehicle repaired is a roll of the dice and I won big here.  I have no qualms about taking my vehicle to this station and neither should you.

name: Bo Foster
text: I've been using Alabama Auto Services for a decade to service my vehicles. This business is run by very trustworthy and extremely accommodating people to say the least.  They're very reasonable in terms of maintenance and repair costs and always call to consult with you prior to doing anything to your vehicle.   I highly recommend this local business for automotive service and repair.

name: Tyler Hardwick
text: I owned a 99 Ram 1500, with the 5.9L V8. I became a routine customer getting my oil changed here. Every time they changed it, they upgraded me to the synthetic blend free of charge. Awesome guys, and an awesome owner. Thanks!

name: Caron R
text: These folks are friendly, very fair and never do anything without making sure I agree to the work.  I feel so comfortable dealing with them! i never feel like I have been taken advantage of.....not so with all shops.  ESP for women!

name: Kelly Howard
text: Got my car radiator fixed and they did a great job!  I highly recommend them.

name: Jenny Seale
text: This business went above and beyond to give us a safe place to land in our time of need. We were pulling our camper from Texas to Florida when our truck broke down on a Friday evening in heavy rain. We were stranded on the eastbound side of the I 10 bridge, just past the U.S.S. Alabama. When my husband called Alabama Auto Service Center, the owner stayed an hour after closing to wait for a tow truck to get us there.  He allowed us to park our camper at his shop overnight and gave us access to his water and electricity so we could use our shower and run fans overnight. Saturday morning our truck was quickly serviced and we were back on the road by 10:30. Thank you Alabama Auto Service Center!

name: Chase White
text: I ordered new tires from an online store and had this service center install them. Very good prices and service. Was in and out in less than an hour. Will do business with again.

text: They do great work here..i absolutely reccomend them!

text: This place is beyond unprofessional.. I brought my own tires to get put on and they said my 2013 dodge dart was too low to the ground, they couldn't put the tires without Jack's, which is fine with me. Then I told them not to use the impact to take my lugs off as they will strip them and they stripped one and refused to pay for it. They told me i had to buy more lugnuts which cost me $160 and still don't have new tires on..

text: Only tire shop I'll use!

name: Linda Daw
text: I trust Greg and employees with my life every day.  Greg's Goodyear business  takes care of all my auto needs and the service is excellent.  Many of my friends, as well as myself, depend on them to take care of our auto's and keep us safe. I can depend on them.

name: Mary Cartwright
text: This place used to be reasonable but now they are the highest place in town for repairs I'm very disappointed they even sold me 10 yr old tires with dry rot. They returned them but for 50 dollars more Walmart gave me brand new tires. I'm kinda questioning their integrity at this point. I know how shops run but at the same time I also know how the repairs are done so I'm not really someone you can rip off when I take my car in to be fixed I usually know exactly how long and what it should cost. Their prices are deff above fair, almost unreasonable.

Also noticed as I was leaving that they had tightened my loose gearshift handle for free. Very friendly and knowledgeable/professional staff. Will definitely be back!

text: Excellent customer service, very knowledge. Don't be fooled by the humble exterior, these guys will get it done right. Old school wisdom, new school knowledge. If you want something a step above a typical alignment at a dealer or full service these are the guys. I must sound like a BS review, but I drive some very expensive (typically seen as complex -.-) European vehicles, and these guys have done better that century on alignments.

name: Tonya Toots
text: Unbeatable prices! And very honest! We took our Expedition to have tires put on at a local (Fayetteville) tire place that also does alignments. They quoted us over 600$! After listing off a bunch of other BS they claimed needed fixed BEFORE they could do our alignment. Took it to Jim (Tom Sharp Tire) and Jim called us (promptly mind you) to tell us that it "wasn't as bad as he thought it was going to be", said he'd have it done a few hours later AND it was only costing us 165$!!!!!!! Yep. This will be the only place we take our vehicles to from now until they close the doors for good!! Thank you Mr. Jim! You're a good man!

name: Shane Wilson
text: They are the only shop I trust completely. Every vehicle I have taken to Mr. Sharp still runs and drives great. Even the one I drove up a telephone pole.
