name: Matt Bryson
text:
I went to get my battery recharged or replaced. I pulled up and waited 10 minutes and then was waived off by the only employee in the bay working.

After someone finally came out to check, they said that my 5-year warranty on my battery was actually only good for 3 years and then they give your a credit towards a new battery for whatever is left of the last 2 years. I get it if that was the policy, but just very crummy that it wasn’t explained that way when I purchased and false advertising on the battery as it explicitly says “5-year Warranty”. Luckily the battery could be recharged after an hour.

name: Vanessa Kynes
text: Unfortunately, after an oil change here, I had a continuous oil leak. We finally discovered what the issue was and it required a mechanic and new part to repair. The mechanic mentioned it was from over tightening parts (cracked the oil sending unit) during the oil chance (since we didn't have the oil leak before).

name: ALLAN BARNETT
text: I wanted to pick up what I needed and it was quick and easy to go through the auto service center and the staff was very helpful.

name: Natia Joy
text: I went there for a simple oil change and a tire rotation and now my car is making the worst noise I’ve ever heard and they say they can’t do anything about it. ALRIGHT LOL

name: Kenneth Kendrick
text: great customer service quick and efficient  friendly

name: Stacy Beardslee
text: My tire light went on literally 2 minutes before pulling in to this ACC. I had driven through an accident 10 minutes before and knew this had meant that I had run over something. I live an hour away and wanted to find out if there was anything they could help me with it, I knew it was close to closing (about 15 minutes till) but my child was in the car and I wanted to make sure we'd make it back home safely. I tried to explain this to the man out in the shop (I was approached before I could even get out of the car) but he kept interrupting me stating that they were closing and trying to finish up on the car they were currently working on. All I wanted at the least was someone with a little knowledge to look at my tire and give me a recommendation/ opinion as to what my options would be. I understand that everyone wants to go home when their scheduled to, but come on! I just wanted to make sure I could make it home with my child safely!

name: Nelson Henderson
text:
Had battery for 5 years and today was the day to install a new one.
Randle greeted me very friendly and got work order started and tech installed battery very fast.
Walmart Automotive did great good getting me in and out.

name: Marcus Ross
text: Awful customer service. Very disrespectful. Extremely unorganized staff. Wish I could give them no stars. I called and asked for 2 tires for my car, they gave me the total price for both being installed for $155.16 before taxes. I told them let's do it and to order the tires. They called me back a few hours later telling me the tires were in. I drove 30 minutes down 280 for the tires. I pulled up and they told me they would get me right in and taken cared of. I went inside for a few minutes and saw my car was up on the lift, I waited for about 15-20 minutes and noticed my car was out of the shop, so I asked them if it was finished, and waited and waited and waited, and after talking to three different people it turned out they didn't do anything to the car at all. They just pulled it into the shop lifted it up, and then lowered it and pulled it out, and never relayed the information about why they did this. When I finally got someone to talk to the guys, they said that they didn't have the tires I ordered, and I told them that they had called me and told me they did and that I have a voicemail from them stating that they did, and I played the voicemail for them, and then talked to the guy directly that left me the voicemail. So, they go and look and turns out they do have the tires after all. They pull my car back in and put the tires on, then ring me up for $211.00, and I'm like, "I'm not paying that", then I have to talk to the manager that's "running" the shop, and finally after 3 hours I get the price they told me, thank goodness I had the voicemail from them for proof, and I got out. Never. Going. Back. Maybe the most unprofessional atmosphere and experience I've ever had with a business. Truly disappointing in every way. They were also very rude to the other customers that were waiting patiently as well. They would blatantly ignore you when you'd approach them with a question about your vehicle or the situation they were putting you in. Just straight up walk past you and not say a word to you or look you in the eyes. If and when they finally did talk to you, they just mumbled their words and you couldn't understand a thing they were saying. They need to clean house, get rid of the manager and all. If not that, then just do the entire state of Alabama a favor and close up shop completely, because you're not doing any good for anyone. Like, you're not even doing your jobs, like at all. Since I left, I've actually been wondering "what's even the point of this shop"? The guys are all just hanging out. Finally the guy that did put the tires on my car was just some dude, that wasn't even in a uniform like the rest of the automotive crew was. He was just in some shirt and ball cap with sun glasses, so I'd at least like to thank the random guy that probably doesn't even work there that actually did the work. Maybe he was an angel or something....? If it turns out he is an actual angel and it's some kind of real miracle, it's still not worth going back for.

name: L Atchison
text: Fast quality tire repair service while I shopped for other items needed, with one easy checkout.

name: Jody Gable
text: These people will do everything they can to help you to their knowledge. I take my car there every time I need a oil change where my tires changed and they always provide me with good work and  customer service. one time my husband took my car up there and they did something wrong I don't know what it was but he took it back and they fixed it.

name: Sharon Byrd
text: I have had them change my oil on my car  Excellent  job very friendly

name: Macey Franklin
text: The price is the best you can find... But you get what you pay for. The staff is very inefficient. There is usually about one car in the bay and they will tell you it’s going to be an hour and a half.  If you don’t mind wasting your time in saving the money I guess it’s worth it.

name: Mike Hiatt
text: Real rude service. Will definitely not be going back.

name: Wil Johnson
text:
Horrible staff.
Manager was nice but guys working it stink. Was told they would get me in as long as I got there before 7:00pm and I got there at 6:45pm. They close at 8. I drove 20 minutes on a spare tire only to have them rudely just repeat themselves saying “we’re closed” “we’re closed”. Wouldn’t even listen to me trying to explain my situation and that they told me on the phone they would service me if I got there before 7. He just walked off while I was talking and I had to follow him inside. Only once I asked to speak to the manager did he explain it was because they were full and wouldn’t finish before 8. I asked them to please help me out as my wife had to get to work tomorrow and my spare tire was going flat. They were no help so I went to NTB tires down the street and they quickly took care of me. Walmart you lost a customer from your horrible service. I had always previously used you, but no longer.

name: Michelle Carroll
text: I had an appointment for 2 to put new tires on. They didn't even start to take the old tires off until 3pm. When I asked why they were getting started so late, the cashier said "oh you had an appointment?". I was not told about a mandatory lifetime balance charge per tire until I was being checked out.

name: Lisa Rinehart
text: Called Leeds, Chelsea, Pelll City and Talladega before someone in the Automotive department finally decided to help me. Hoover/280 tire center finally offered to help by ordering tires for me. I was overall vet pleased, missing one star because nobody is ever available to answer phone. I had to call multiple times to find out if tires were in.

name: Tim Sager
text: 3+ hours for tires. Quoted wrong price (of course ended up with higher price) and of course the "don't give a blank" attitude. Other than that I spent a great half a day at Walmart.

name: Matt Baker
text: They werent able to flush and replace antifreeze or change trans fluid but other than that it was ok...

name: Carlos R
text: Incredibly slow. All I have is a flat tire that I want them to check if they can repair it. They said they'd have a look at it and printed me a little ticket to wait. It's been 2 hours and they haven't even looked at it yet. Go somewhere else if you don't have all day long for a 5 minute job.

text:
No one at the desk.
One man saw me and left.
Another told me they we're to busy to make me a key

text: Unhelpful staff, disorganized, all around lousy place to get tire service. Left a tire and rim for flat repair overnight and they couldn't find it the next day. I had to get it myself!

name: Stina Journey
text: I tried calling them to set up an appointment and no one picked up the phone. I work in retail and my fellow coworkers and I always try to answer by the third ring. Not the 7th or 8th ring. My service is going somewhere else.

text: I have had slow service here repeatedly. These guys need to be put on commission. It may be understaffed which is wallmarts fault. I pulled up today and one of the mechanics put a cone in front of my car and then walked away. No thanks, plenty of other places I can take my business. If you can't come up to the window and at least say hello then forget it.

name: Ryan Jones
text: My opinion is if you need vehicle or tire service, take it somewhere else... Every Wal-Mart I have ever let service any of my vehicles has always resulted in SOMETHING being wrong. The last time, for example, they rotated the tires on my wife's car but in doing so, they put the lug nuts on so tight that I had to take it to a mechanic to get them back off (and yes, the mechanic also said they were on way too tight). Please spare yourself and take your business elsewhere if you need auto work!

text: Gucci

text: Roger is so sweet. He knows what he is doing and will make sure you are safe. I would recommend him to anyone. He doesn't over charge either.

name: Jason Burden
text: He did a great job on my brakes and was friendly

name: John Converse
text: Roger did my front end alignment as he said that he would.  He started on the job late in the day and true to his word he finished it.  If and when I need work like this done again, I will go back to Roger again.

name: Jerry T
text: Alex when lower a car you change the steering geometry. More pressure on tie rod ends, bearings. Factory specs are not good anymore. Sometimes car cannot even be pulled on rack if too low. It takes 3 times as long to align. When your 16 year old some things are just hard to understand. How many shops did you try that wouldn't work on it before you come here?

name: Greg T.
text: Don't need to make an appointment. Get there early and you're in and out first. Excellent work done right the first time. Roger worked on 3 of my vehicles over the years. Wish he had another mechanic - he's a one-man operation.

name: Terry Gamble
text: I have been doing business with Roger for almost 40 years. He is a very honest man and has always done excellent work on my vehicles. I highly recommend him.

name: Daniel
text:
Terrible! I walked in and shook the guys hand being very friendly and told him I was looking for somebody to do a front end alignment on my truck. The guy walked out from behind the desk and called an older man who was in the garage. The man walked in and told me it would be a little over an hour before he could get to it so I would have to wait. I told him that I would have to come back later as I have a ton of homework for my college classes to get done and the guy got so mad. He said, "I don't really want to fool with you anyways. If you don't have time to wait an hour then you don't have time to get an alignment so just go somewhere else" and then he walked back into the shop and slammed the door behind him. Apparently he was the owner.

I kept my cool the entire time because I understand that work can be stressful, but that is absolutely no way to run a business or treat your customers. If you do decide to go here, just keep in mind that you are not worth his time and he would rather tell you off then to work with you and treat you right.

name: Exploring With Alex
text: DO NOT GO HERE! They are rude and i called before I went there and asked how much a front end alignment would be and they told me it would be $69 and I get there and after about 2 hours waiting on a 70 year old man to do the alignment they told me the total was $90 because my car had been lowered or was lowered. What does that matter a car is a car and it was just a alignment. I do not recommend this place!

name: Wayne Neff
text: Services limited but honest and good work for brakes and alighnment

name: Patricia Levinson
text: Very rude. Just got a quote from another mechanic to fix what he was supposed to but just ended up messing up even worse.

name: Libby
text: This place is beyond awesome! Very kind, fairly priced, gets you in and gets you out, clean office if you must wait with several kitties to greet you! I'm 67;years old single female. I have never had such great quality service in my life! Thank you Anderson Motors! I will be back!

resp.text: My gosh, thank so so kindly for such a wonderful review!! We are so glad you found us and appreciate your business. Again, thank you, you made our day!

name: Shaq Carroll
text: Engine replacement went well. Price was the best in the city. Great customer service. They actually pick up phone calls the best I’ve seen

resp.text: Thank you so very much Shaquille! It was a pleasure serving you and look forward to helping you with all your automotive needs. Again, thank you!!

name: Howard ODell
text: They troubleshoot my AC system and found it was working perfectly. They didn’t charge me a dime for looking at my car.  Very happy with that. I strongly recommend them. I will definitely do business with them again.

resp.text: Howard, our goal is to take care of our customers, period. We greatly appreciate you and all our wonderful customers. Always glad to be of service and thank you very much for your kind review!

name: Jacob Achenbach
text: Very nice people, do honest work. Just be sure to validate all you want done. Got a quote previous to picking up my vehicle and the quote was 160$ less than what I ended up paying.

resp.text: Thank you Jacob for your reply. As far as the $160, that was the VVT connnector, labor and the diagnostics which you were told ahead per the service manager. Communication is always hard on both sides. Hopefully, you understand and accept our apology for any miscommunications. We hope to be of service again, thanks so much.

name: Damien Chisholm
text: Loved their professionalism and on prompt service. The prices  are great as well. Services were complete in one day.

resp.text: Damien, thank you for trusting us with your vehicle. It was a pleasure to help you out quickly and efficiently. If you need anything else from us, let me know! -Audrey R, Business Owner

name: Timothy Rose
text: Some rodent rip  wires under hood . Repair quickly

resp.text: Thank you so much Tim, we were so happy to take care of the rodent/wiring problem. Let us know if we can be of service in the future.

name: Nathan Teague
text: I have several vehicles at all times, I started using Anderson motor company as my primary mechanic shop a while back and have taken several vehicles down for them to work on. They have been very thorough, and always communicate very well concerning the needs of each project, and the best way to go concerning resolving the issue. I am very pleased with their service and their turn around time. I have a few more projects I'm sending their way soon.

resp.text: Nathan, it's been a joy and an honor to partner with you on those projects. It means a lot coming from another business owner like yourself! Thank you again for being our customer!

name: shantell parson
text: AWESOME!!!  Is all I can say!!  I will be back EVERYTIME for my repairs!!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We are very happy to be of service and so glad you found us. You will have to bring your finished blanket to show us next you come back, it will be gorgeous.

name: Nancy Hill
text: When the oil light on my old van kept flickering on and off I thought it was a goner. Anderson Motor diagnosed and fix the problem at a very reasonable price. I'm very happy with the service I received. I loved the office cats too!

resp.text: Thank you so much Nancy! It is pleasure to take of your needs.

name: Zujey Echeverria
text: Super helpful, I went to them cuz of my warranty even tho they didn’t cover in the end. Anderson help with a good deal.Will definitely return if I have more car issues. Love that there work has warranty on it. They even waited for me since they know I was driving from a good long drive.

resp.text: Hello Zujey and thank you for the great review.  We really appreciate that you trusted us with your vehicle and are delighted to hear that you are happy with our work.  We’ll be here to help you whenever you need service or repair – just give us a call.

name: Captain_Catbeard
text: I am so very thankful that this company and the people that work for it exist. I'm a retired disabled vet living with my partner and two cats on the road in our 1977 Dodge American Clipper RV and our mechanical fuel pump went out while traveling through town. I called several mechanics in the area but Anderson Motor company were the only ones willing to help us out. Originally I was told that they may not be able to get to it until Wednesday on a Friday which would have taken us out of our home, but after explaining that situation to Chris at the shop he did everything in his power to get us back on the road. Even though they were backed up Chris made our problem his problem and bless him for getting us back on the road that day. Our two cats were also very happy to get home. We were treated like family by the front staff and I would recommend this shop a thousand times over. Great people great prices. Thank God for Anderson Motor Company they really saved our butts.

resp.text: Oh my gosh!! Thank you Travis! We all were speaking about how kind you and your lady were and such a pleasure to help out. It was very thoughtful and well appreciated to get such a great review from you. Happy travels and we hope to see you whenever you come this way again for an update on your adventures!

name: Charles Grimes
text: Anderson Motor Co has something that money can't buy - honesty and integrity. Super nice people that get it right the first time at a very reasonable price.

resp.text: Hello Charles and thank you for the great review.  We really appreciate that you trusted us with your vehicle and are delighted to hear that you are happy with our work.  We’ll be here to help you whenever you need service or repair – just give us a call.

name: Tina Wilbourn
text: All around great service! Best place to take your car for repairs. They know their stuff! Very affordable!! My kids love the shop cats!

resp.text: Tina – it is always great to hear from happy customers and your review has made our day.  We strive to provide excellent customer service and we are very glad that is exactly what you experienced.  Just give us a call when you are ready for your next service or repair!

name: Samuel Hunt
text: I attempted to take my vehicle in for repairs two different times. I received a quote for a front end overhaul, and a fuel pump replacement. The charges, in my opinion, were so outrageous to me that I decided to go somewhere else for both repairs. I am not a wealthy person. When they told me the cost of the part and the 55% markup of an additional $160 to me just for the part, they told me "I have to keep the shop in business". The labor was going to be an additional $100/hr. What they don't know is I know how to look up the cost of the part. I also know they receive discounts from parts suppliers when sourcing parts for repairs. They were going to charge me full retail for the part, and then add an additional 50% markup to me???!!!! That is outrageous. I will never be back to that shop and waste my time. It is unfortunate ☹️ that you can't trust auto repair places in Huntsville because this is how they gouge their customers and rip them off. When I complained about it being too much and unreasonable, he justified it by saying that's what all the shops in Huntsville do. I just moved here a year ago. Although I have been blessed in my past getting auto repair service from shops/owners who I became friends with, I would never have expected shops in Huntsville operate like they do.

resp.text: Mr. Hunt was never paid us to repair a vehicle. He has brought different vehicles here various times, got our diagnosis and he did the work himself. We charged him a checkout fee the last time and he obviously doesn't believe our time and effort matters. We are a very honest and upfront business and sincerely take great care with our customers. Some people cannot be pleased, this is the case here.

name: Kim McNatt
text: Friendly and fairly fast service. Reasonably priced

resp.text: Thanks so much Mr. McNatt for your wonderful review, it is greatly appreciated!

name: Hunt Shepard
text: Anderson Motor Company is the best shop in Huntsville For auto repairs and maintenance. I’m extremely impressed with their staff and the work they did on my vehicle. They provided me options, communicated consistently, and their work was done perfectly. This is my preferred shop going forward!

resp.text: Thank you Hunt for the good review.  It is customers like you that make the hard work of running an auto repair shop worth it.  We were delighted to be able to help you with your issue.  Don’t hesitate to give us a call the next time you need service or repair.

name: Alicia S
text: Never have to worry about being overcharged for work or being told you need work that you don't.  Honest people!

resp.text: You are so kind!! Thank you for being our customer and for this awesome review.

name: Willie Faulks
text: Wonderful place to take ur vehicle reasoning w there customers and very honest I have taken both vehicles there for repairs both was fixed and did not have to take back or call. 🙂👍

resp.text: Thanks so very much! We love our customers and will always try to do our best.

name: Kim Stitz
text: We have taken our vehicle to them for about 7 years they always do a great job

text: Has a A1 machanic his name is Chris he and the rest of the employees are nice and ask before they do anything great timing and they make you laugh feel like family

resp.text: Thank you Missme for the good review.  It is customers like you that make the hard work of running an auto repair shop worth it.  We were delighted to be able to help you with your issue.  Don’t hesitate to give us a call the next time you need service or repair.

name: Jaynne Matson
text: Nice quick and friendly

resp.text: Jaynne, thanks for the review! If we can ever lend a hand with anything, please get in touch. -Audrey R, Business Owner

name: Wadeea Alwajih
text: I love this place this Lady are a amazing beautiful smile and attitude

resp.text: Wadeea - Thank you for making time to leave us a review. We appreciate your kind words.

name: Susan Lyons
text: We have been taking our vehicles to Anderson for years and plan on doing so in the future.

resp.text: Susan, thank you so very much. I missed getting to see Ms. Lola and give her a treat. You are very kind!

name: June Wade
text: This place the best!!! I will recommend it to all of my family and friends.

resp.text: Hello June.  We really appreciate the review.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to service your vehicle.  Please give us a call when you need service in the future.

name: Anna Grace
text: I was referred to Anderson Motor Company and have heard such great things. I left my acadia today.. so I haven't even gotten the vehicle back yet and already eager to leave a review. I know from experience that taking your car somewhere can cause so much anxiety. Especially if youre like me and have had to take it to about 6 differemt shops with no hope. Trust is the number one thing you care for when going through troubles. I wanted to say that these people made me feel more secure than any other. They were able to prove the problem to me before i left and talked me through my worries like i was family. Im so hopeful and possitive for the first time in a year and a half. Thank you Anderson. We have already decoded we will be bringing our other 2 vehicles to them soon

resp.text: Anna Grace – we really appreciate the kind words.  We know it can be difficult to determine the best place to take your car for service and we are honored that you trusted us to take care of your issue.  To read your words makes us feel even better about it.  Thank you and please give us a call the next time you need anything

name: walter mcgucken
text: I have used Anderson Motors for years and they have always done a great job at a fair price and in a timely manner. All the folks i have dealt with there have been helpful and courteous!

resp.text: So kind! Thank you so very much.

name: Howard Williams
text: Have always received excellent service, and the reception people at the front desk are the best. Would not take my Jeep any where else for my mechanical needs.

resp.text: Howard – we really appreciate the kind words.  We know it can be difficult to determine the best place to take your car for service and we are honored that you trusted us to take care of your issue.  To read your words makes us feel even better about it.  Thank you and please give us a call the next time you need anything.

name: Brenda Freeman
text: Nice people with good service.

resp.text: Thank you so very much Ms. Freeman for your kind words!

name: Ryan Anderson
text: Great service, low prices

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star review Ryan. We appreciate your support!

name: Hugh Brady
text: They completed the work on time at a reasonable cost.  Their positive attitude and customer care was great!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for being our customer!

name: Lindell Smith
text: Very professional and pleasant to deal with.

resp.text: Thanks so much Mr. Smith for your great review and for being our customer!

name: Alfred Dolezal
text: Reliable, knowledgeable & professional.  Your vehicle is in good hands here.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We greatly appreciate your kinds words.

name: Jeff Bobo
text: Anderson always provides quality service and customer interaction.

resp.text: Thank you Jeff for the good review.  It is customers like you that make the hard work of running an auto repair shop worth it.  We were delighted to be able to help you with your issue.  Don’t hesitate to give us a call the next time you need service or repair.

name: Raymond Michels
text: Caught out of town with a failed transfer case due to a bad U-joint and transmission damaged too. Replacements arrived the next day and replaced with issues in two days. Drives like it used to.

resp.text: We really appreciate the review Raymond.  We pay special attention to providing great service at our shop and we are always pleased to hear it when we’ve hit the mark.  Don’t hesitate to give us a call when we can be of help in the future.

name: Will McDonald
text: I've been going to Anderson Motors for 10+ years and they are always professional and honest.

resp.text: Thanks so much!!!!

name: Isaac Pyritz
text: The lady at the front is very nice and she makes up for a lot of the agitation you can get from the rude men in the back but the service and the unreliability is just not what I would recommend. I had an entire paragraph typed out but ultimately that is all I should say.

resp.text: We are so sorry you feel that way. The starter we put on failed and we did replace it free charge but it was an inconvenience. Hopefully, in the future, give us another chance!

name: Garrett Manley
text: Great place!

resp.text: We appreciate this great review, Garrett! Please feel free to get in touch if we can assist you in the future. -Audrey R, Business Owner

name: Ben Runyan
text: Installed rear suspension that I provided for cheap labor cost in a timely manner. Quoted two scratches on my car on the spot. Extremely nice people and knowledgeable mechanics. Will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: C Goss
text: Spoke to a mechanic ( don't remember his name) over the phone about a check engine light on in my '93 Mazda and how I was unable to find anyone with an OBD1 scanner. I really appreciated how upfront and honest he was and he told me the best way to accurately read the code. I'll probably start bringing my other cars here in the future!

resp.text: Thanks so very much! We would be so happy to help you with any work in the future that you may need!

name: Traci Northcutt
text: I’ve been using Anderson since I moved here from VA in 2011. They’ve always given me the most prompt and efficient service. They were recommended to me, and I’ve recommended them many times. Anything from major body repair after an accident to minor routine maintenance- I refuse to go anywhere else. Thanks for many years of excels service!

resp.text: Thanks so much for being our loyal customer all these years!

name: jane h.
text: Always helpful, always treat us like family; and they always do excellent, reliable work.

resp.text: That is exactly how we feel about our customers, they are family! Thanks so very much, it is greatly appreciated!

name: Kristian King
text: This man is awful. Worst customer service I've ever experienced. Will never return to this over priced hack shop.

resp.text:
King Incident – 8-7-2017

The car was towed in with the symptoms of no crank and no start. It was apparent someone had been working on it prior to it arriving at Anderson Motor Company since the area around the fuse panel was disassembled, screws were left on the floor, etc. The Kings told us they had already replaced the battery, the starter, and an alternator to no avail.

The first thing found during diagnosis was a burnt ignition switch. After a new ignition switch was installed, the same fuse blew again. It was apparent at this point that the vehicle was in a shorted state.

Next, we began pulling the wiring diagrams. From the fuse panel we checked the following components one by one:
-	Fuel injection
-	Ignition coils
-	Instrument cluster
-	Circuit opening relay
-	Charging circuit
We determined the location of the electrical short was the junction box interior fuse panel. The junction box was available from the dealer at a cost of $340.97 with a delay of several days before one could be obtained. Mrs. King informed us that she could not wait for the part and did not want to pay the quoted price for it either. We bypassed the junction box and ignition switch. The vehicle now starts and runs. Most importantly, the root cause of all her electrical problems was that her husband installed a battery and hooked it up backwards, thereby shorting out the system. He self-installed the alternator, battery, and starter, and still had the no crank/no start symptoms. Mrs. King called at least twice a day and was constantly aware of our progress on her vehicle.
She was happy during the process and had no problem with the cost until she informed us she wanted to pay with her mother’s credit card. We asked that her mother complete our credit card authorization form, which we require for all off-site credit card transactions. At this point, she became extremely hostile and her whole behavior towards the shop changed. She cursed my receptionist and my service manager, spewing F-bombs, etc. This occurred on a Friday
(8-4-17). On the following Monday (8-7-17), she came to pick up the vehicle and used a card with a different name than we had listed for her in our system. She stated that it was her maiden name and she hadn’t changed everything over yet. Her husband said the same. At this point, I asked to see her driver’s license to confirm that her ID matched the credit card she was presenting for payment. She went ballistic – screaming, cussing, and completely belligerent. She called her mother and put her on the phone with me and I calmly explained the situation.
Mrs. King’s mother then emailed her approval to use the credit card and the payment was processed. The Kings left at that point.

name: Angela Wilson
text: Zee

resp.text: Angela, thanks so much for this review. Let us know if we can do anything else for you. =The Anderson Motor Company team

name: Cliff McGinness
text:
I've been a loyal customer for years on my many different vehicles. They were just completely unprofessional and rude to me! I will not be back again! There are a million repair shops around town, find a different one to take your vehicle to.
In response to their reply, they have no idea what was going on and are completely incorrect! They immediately made assumptions and asked me to leave! I even went back in to try and give her another chance to listen, but just more ridiculousness. Go through the Google and Facebook reviews, I'm not the only one

resp.text: I refused to add damage to Mr. McGinness's estimate for body work that I had written prior 06/15/18 and that he was attempting to get someone else to pay for. He wanted to add headlamps and a mirror which I have photographs proving were not part of the original accident. I am a professional, not a liar or a cheat. My photos show a perfectly intact passenger mirror, etc... which were on the opposite side of the original damaged area (driver's side). We appreciate all of our customers and their patronage, but we will not compromise our ethics for anyone.

name: Gopala Myneni
text: Attention to detail. Correct diagnosis. Very co-operative.

resp.text: Thanks so very much, you are always a pleasure to accommodate.

name: Stan Sims
text:
Outstanding work, enjoyed the little extras!
Would definitely go back....

resp.text: That is so very nice! Thank you so much for being our customer, you are outstanding!

name: Justin Lutz
text: Very fast turnaround with excellent workmanship. I've used them multiple times and received the upmost respect and customer care A+++

resp.text: Thanks so very much!! Just saw this absolutely kind review. It is greatly appreciated, thanks again!

name: Cam Duff
text: They towed our car after a bad wreck the police officers request. They wouldn't tow it to our house. Then we were charged for the days they weren't open and we couldn't retrieve the vehicle. When we paid the charges for storing the vehicle and towing it to our house, they didn't even bring us the vehicle until the next afternoon! Highly dissatisfied.

name: John King

name: John Robinson
text: Lack of communication during the repair process was an issue. Was hard to get in touch with the service  manager to get questions  answered

resp.text: This is perplexing, the lack of communication was the other way around. The customer supplied his own engine to be replaced and possibly the frustration belongs to that process with the supplier and himself. We definitely communicate with our customers and believe in its importance.
Thank you for making the time to review our services Ariadna. We appreciate your business.

name: Chris Browning
text: Very helpful

resp.text: It is greatly appreciated, thank you!

name: Kenneth Alexander
text: Very professional

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a great review!

name: Elizabeth Lopez
text: very nice people....great quality work

resp.text: Thanks so very much!

name: Adam HULL
text: Used him before.  And always go there if he is open. But he is only open 3 hours a day Monday through Friday. And not on Saturdays. He will come in on Saturday if it it really important. But with the limited hours it's hard to go there

name: Fred Pope
text: They do great work . Always busy but always finds time to help. Thanks Mr Jimmy

name: antione newton
text: Been going here for 18 years. I live an hour away and it doesn't bother me one bit to make that drive to see Jimmy. He's that good. He's so fair. As long as he's in business, I won't use anyone else

name: Sharon Willett
text:
This man saved us allot of money. I had been going to one on 202 but every time we always found a finishing nail in the rear pass. side tire. 4 times this happened to us. Thank you and I know where I will be going from now on.
He even  stayed after closing to help us.

name: Karen Allen
text: Jimmy Wilson at  Brooks tire service is exceptional in his customer service and courtesy to  his customers.  I needed two new tires and Mr Wilson had them for me today.  He also gave me excellent advice on which tires to keep.  I recommend him to all who need tires.

name: Renee Pruitt
text: Great place! Very friendly and super fast service! Top notch service and AFFORDABLE! I recommend this tire shop and will be going here again for any tire  services I may need in the future.

name: Adam H
text: Quick and friendly service

name: Joshua Abbott
text: He charged my wife $35 to plug a tire for some reason. Closed after 12

name: Brook Magee
text: Extremely helpful and friendly. The prices are low, and the quality is top shelf. I recommend this place for any service you need done on your car!

name: Butterflyfrog Guess
text: Great place ! Even stayed after closing to help me get tire fixed !!

name: Toni Lachapelle
text: Service was quick.

name: Braymon Brooks
text: Fast service

name: Donnie Kelley
text: Great place

name: Marlon Morris
text: Mr. Jimmy is.....THE BEST!!!! He got me  road ready for the weekend; even with alllllll the challenges that popped up!!! Thanks again, Mr. Jimmy!!

name: Sean Jensen
text: This shop and the employees saved me over Memorial Day weekend. My trailer picked up a nail in one of the tires and obviously leaking air. Even though they were booked for the whole weekend they were able to squeeze me in to patch and plug my tire. This got me back on the road so I could get all the way back to Texas without missing work. I am very grateful for what they did for me, and the staff working extra to accommodate me. Very friendly and professional shop will recommend for anything you need.

name: Robert Burns
text: A welcome and much-needed addition to the Auburn Opelika area. Firestone has been there for us for years and has serviced all of our vehicles! Most definitely glad to have them in town!

name: Haley Sherman
text: Today was such a great experience! Earnest and Tiffany were SO KIND and patient with me. It was my first time buying new tires and they walked me through that process very well. They also made sure to check other aspects of my car to make sure it was safe when I left the store. I will FOR SURE be going back there. Good people. High quality work. What more could you ask for?

resp.text: Hi Haley, we appreciate the feedback so much. It's great hearing our services met your expectations! Thank you for stopping by our Firestone! ^Blake

name: Sandra Hull
text: I was driving home to ATL and my check engine light came on. I stopped in at Firestone and was well taken care of. Everyone here was kind, helpful and informative.  I truly felt like I was a priority as everyone here worked fast and efficient just so I could get back onto the road and make it home. Thank you again Tiffany and Earnest for your help!

name: Nate VanderWoude
text: I went in for an oil change on a Sunday, which is a walk-in only time. I fully understand that wait times are longer with a shorter staff, and no scheduled times. I got there at 1pm and was told that it wouldn't be done until 3-3:30. Again, it's a long wait, but I understand. At about 3, another customer comes in for a new battery. He is given an estimate that it will be about 5 when his vehicle is ready. At 3:45 both of our cars are taken to the back by the same technician. Again, this is already 15 minutes past my estimated completion time. My car is lifted, and the oil is drained. The tech then moved to the battery change, and worked there until it was completed at 4:15. He then disappeared, then came back and finished my oil change at 4:45. Again, I am a reasonable customer, but having another customer moved in front of me for no reason, causing me to wait for nearly 4 hours is absolutely unacceptable. I won't be going back.

name: Jared Stauffer
text: I came in at 4:55 on Sunday with a nail in my tire. I was on my way back from Auburn and heading the whole way to South Carolina. I didn’t realize I had a nail until I was on the road. Paul and his team were more than happy to help. Firestone closes at 5 pm on Sunday, but they stayed late just to help patch my tire. Super grateful for them. Will be coming back to Firestone in the future!!

name: T Potts
text: Pretty clean shop area. Usually quite busy. Appointment recommended. They've done quite a few repairs on my old pickup truck and so far I'm well pleased with results.

name: Joshua Jones
text: When their competitors were having a day off, the good people at Firestone saved the day by not only having the scarce tire I was looking for, but was able toput it on the very same day!

name: Chicky The Awesome
text: I love Tiffany the manager. We were there getting tires but they also let us know our battery was low. Excellent service. Paid for 4 new tires and a lifetime warranty alignment cheaper here than three other places that I called for a quote. They have my business from here on out. Great folks and excellent service and quality maintenance.

name: Alisha Walker
text: I went in for a oil change, and the next day my oil light came on. I called and someone told me they probably didn’t put enough oil in it.. a month later my car started making noise because I didn’t have anyone oil at all. They never game me a sticker in the left corner to let me know when I should get another one. Wouldn’t recommend when it comes to the an oil change!!!

name: Michael Easterwood
text: Very nice people working here. I highly recommend this place.

name: James Acord
text: My family and I have been long term Firestone customer. We’ve been to countless Firestones and I can reassure you this one is the best of them all. There is a common denominator and that is the supervisor Tiffany Stevens. She goes completely above and beyond to service her customers and treat them right. If there was a definition of perfect customer service she meets & exceeds those expectations. She was previously at the Fort Benning Firestone that my father goes to and she was phenomenal there. Her leadership at this firestone proves to build the brand and cement our trust in the company. I honestly can’t thank her enough for how kind and helpful she has been to us - She truly deserves infinite praise & recognition for her hard work.

name: Michael Brown
text: Good customer service they explain everything clearly

name: Patrick strickland
text: Very friendly staff did alignment and was quick and very nice. Tiffany was very helpful.

name: Jonathan Keaton
text: Scratched all four of my wife’s rims on her Tahoe and the manager Tiffany said get a quote and they would fix it. Got a quote and she said it was to high so went and got another quote and she said it was turned over to corporate. They absolutely will not pay for there mistakes and make it right with the customer. Never dealt with anything like it in my life. Terrible!!!

resp.text: Hello Jonathan, we are sorry to hear of this issue after service at our Opelika store. We would like to investigate your concerns, please, send us an email to, socialcare@bfrc.com. We will need full details, your contact information, and your invoice number. Thank you for choosing Firestone, we value your business. ^Kristyn

name: Tim Hornsby
text: Recently, my daughter was Traveling from Auburn back to Atlanta.  Before leaving she discovered that one of her tires was very low on Air.  I called Firestone Opelika, AL, since they were the only store open on Sunday.  Paul answered the phone and said he'd be able to look at the tire but wasn't sure he'd have time to fix it since it was almost closing.  The tire had a nail and was not repairable.  Paul worked overtime to make the car safe for my daughter so she could get back home.  Firestone, thank you for caring and providing incredible service.  Next time I'm calling Firestone first.

name: Stephanie S
text: Employee's are nice but when you have an appointment there really slow.

name: K Verb
text: Wow, these guys are the best auto service ever. Shredded two high load trailer tires on the freeway on a Saturday before Father's Day, two hours before closing. They had me in and out in 30 minutes for each tire. Did I mention I had to come back for the second tire? They fit me in between other jobs and got me back on the interstate; kept me from being stranded in town on Father's Day weekend. All was with a smile and a great attitude of, we will get you fixed and on your way, don't worry.

name: Shikera B.
text: A huge thank you to Tiffany for making sure my two day process was completed and my car was taken care of. A company MUST go above and beyond to receive FIVE STARS on any review I complete... Ms. B, a satisfied, loyal customer.

name: edwina halliday
text: Great place. Nicest and caring staff. They didn't think they were able to fix my truck even good enough for the 200 miles I needed to get back home. But they did a wonderful job. The truck levelled out the closer to home I got the better the truck ran.

name: Bettie Whyte
text: A huge thank you to Tiffany for making sure my two day process was completed and my car was taken care of. A company MUST go above and beyond to receive FIVE STARS on any review I complete... Ms. Blakely a satisfied loyal customer.

name: Danny Hale
text: Good people , good service !

name: Deborah Hodges
text: Great service..We had car trouble while traveling through. They were great. Got us back on the road in a very timely manner.

name: Edward Dellascio
text: Fast and courteous

name: Judith Goggans
text: Had a flat tire on the interstate during a very rainy evening minutes away from business. I called to find out how to get to them the quickest because I knew it was closing time according to their website. They got me in and out in a hurry, I ended up having to buy a new tire but it was worth them waiting until I got there to see if they could patch the other tire.

resp.text: Judith, we're so glad that you chose us for your automotive needs. Now, you're a part of the Firestone family! ^Alexis

name: Arturo Vegas
text: We came here in an emergency after finding a slow leak in one of our tires. They were extremely courteous and fast. My overall stay was about an hour or less. Also the place inside was clean and they have a TV for your wait time or there are some shops within walking distance for that too. The parking was not bad and bathroom was clean. Very pleased with the service here.

name: S. S. C.
text: I took my suv there for a tire that they did not have they said they would have the tire the next day so two days later I went to another tire shop and they replaced it the same day save yourself a headache and go somewhere else

resp.text: Hello. We can only imagine how frustrating this was for you, and we apologize. We'd be happy to escalate your concerns to the appropriate management team. Please, feel welcome to email us at socialcare@bfrc.com with these details of your visit, the store location, any related invoice numbers, and your contact information. We appreciate your business with Firestone, and we look forward to your message. ^Mariah

name: Heather Randolph
text: Very friendly and helpful.

name: crdubalyah
text: Super helpful staff. Got my alignment just right and done quickly too!

resp.text: crdubalyah, thank you for choosing Firestone! We look forward to your next visit. ^Jennifer

name: Trayvis Minnifield
text: Great very Great

name: Brittany B Lipscomb
text: Honestly, this review is long overdue. First of all, I never thought a place like this could provide great customer service. But I'm glad that I was wrong. Jim is one of the best mechanics. It is awesome that I can call him and he will literally take time to help me figure out what is going on with my car when I'm2 hours away. He also drove me to work when I was dropping my car off so I didn't have to walk in the cold to work while being sick. He also was willing to drive to Atlanta while my car was having mechanic issues but thankfully, I was able to drive home with his help. I'm not sure what I can say to make you understand that all the amazing guys who work here genuinely care about you. The best part about this place that I frequently visit is that they love my 78 lb dog Waffle and are great about him visiting when the car needs work. They often ask about him if he is not with me. My first encounter with Firestone was with Brandon but since he left, I love the whole team. Thanks Firestone for taking care of me, I am so glad that you are serving Opelika with amazing customer service. I really am grateful to y'all!!

name: Rick Richards
text: I'm pretty cynical about most repair shops, but the folks at your store are just outstanding.  They could not have been more helpful, kind and knowledgeable.  You've got a great team and thanks again

name: JSS Development and JS Management
text: I went there with four new tires I bought off the web For a lot less than they wanted for tires and they said they could not change them that day they were very rude this is my first and last experience at this place

name: Sanghoon Hong
text:
Had my summer tires mounted and aligned a few days ago here. This weekend, I was doing some maintenance on the car in the garage which required me to take the wheels off and oh my did Firestone over torque the lug bolts to hell.
The spec for my BMW is around 103 lbs-ft for the bolts and so usually I'll just pop it off with my impact wrench and go on with my day. My impact wrench wasn't loosening the bolts. OK, maybe it's dying. So I got my breaker bar out and had the back workout of my life. One of the bolts, I had to stand and jump on the breaker bar to loosen it....come on guys, I don't even want to think about what that was torqued to...
Yall made me think my trusty impact wrench was failing me
And they charged me for tire disposal, even though I took the all-season tires that was taken off back with me... but thats a story for another time.

resp.text: Hello Sanghoon, we are sorry to hear about this issue after tire service and would be happy to help. Please, send us an email to, socialcare@bfrc.com, with full details, your contact information, and the store's full address. You are a valued Firestone customer, and we hope to hear from you soon. ^Kristyn

name: grady simpson
text: Paul was awesome. Needed air in the tires of an RV we had just purchased. Paul, who I assumed was the service manager, said sure and personally came out and aired the tires up. It's hard to find customer service like that nowadays. Oh, it was also 5 minutes before closing and no charge.

name: Michael Waldrep
text: Was not satisfied with service and neither was lady customer in line ahead of me,she was complaining also.

resp.text: Michael, we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. This is not the type of service that we expect our loyal customers to receive, and we truly apologize. Please feel welcome to email us at socialcare@bfrc.com with the details of your visit, the store, and your contact information. We value your business, and we thank you for contacting Firestone. ^Jennifer

name: Expert Reviewer
text:
Went to avail myself of my lifetime alignment that I bought and have not used. They told me it would be an hour and they would call when it was ready, so I walked to Lowe's to shop. After several hours and no phone call, I called and was told we cannot touch your car because it is a liability if we do because there is metal showing through and you have to buy tires or we cannot let you go. Started to buy the tires and then realized that the tires had a warranty because they were not that old. So I call and tell them to cancel putting new tires on it. I take it to get the Goodyear warranty honored. Then find out there is NOT any metal showing through the tires and the tires still have mileage. They flat out lied!

I will NEVER buy any products from them ever. I don't care if they are selling tires for half the price of other stores.

name: carina santiago

I went and picked my car up and refused the recommended work. Luckily, I went and got a second opinion from a local mechanic who immediately stated that it was more then likely just the A/C relay switch. And after about 30 minutes my a/c was fixed and it only cost me $50.00. Not sure why Firestone would try to charge me for something that was not broken. I will never recommend this location to anyone because I feel they tried to rip me off.

He was absolutely awesome and I will come back again.

name: LaToya B
text: This place was the absolute worse place I ever been to for car repair service. They were very unprofessional. They lied to me and told me my services would be covered under warranty. They said they called and then told me later warranty was not covering. My car went into the shop running and was there for 3 weeks. When I tried to go get it now they are saying it needs a whole new motor. It was so many levels to this, but I would never in my life ever buy a Dodge and I will never go to that dealership again. Everyone that work there is a complete joke.

text: They have trouble wearing masks correctly. Also, the Service department treats customers like an after thought.

text: automation is awesome! they bought my vehicle and found the exact suv I wanted!! Alexis was so sweet, and oh so helpful!

name: Jackie Camp
text: When my 2014 Chrysler 200 needs service I take it to AutoNation because they are professional and they check everything to make sure no issues arise.  When it's going to be a long wait they come and let you know were they are on each step of repair.  They always have coffee and water if needed.  They also check on recall parts so you want have to come back they fix it doing your service visit.  They always offer other discounts on oil changes, tires and other necessities.  I wouldn't take my Chrysler anywhere else.

name: Matt Montenegro
text: Some of the most sleezy people that give all car sales men a bad name. Purchased a used vehicle from this dealership in May of 2020. I was sold when I was told that my vehicle had an Auto Nation warranty of "90 days or 4,000 miles." Sounds great doesn't it? Well after being hurried along in signing paperwork so the vehicle could be mine I was very happy with my purchase. However, less than a month later, and still well within my "warranty" coverage period I got a Christmas tree of lights on my dashboard. I was told to take it to its dealership and from there I could then make the claim. When I called to make the claim, Auto Nation's warranty service said there was no vehicle with my VIN in the system. I then called the manager there who told me, "I never signed any contract stating I had a warranty and it doesn't matter what I was told because it isn't in writing." I realized the manager was right about this however, I was being told one thing then they intentionally rushed me through signing paperwork so that I wouldn't catch that I never signed anything for my "warranty". The deceptive methods of these people shows that they are talented at one thing and, one thing only and, that is lying to people. These people are clearly slimy and cannot be trusted, save yourself the hassle and do not purchase a vehicle from here. Learn from my mistake, don't come here. Where ever you do go, whatever you are offered make sure it is in writing!!!!

name: William Mott
text: The two service advisors I usually deal with are Michael Robinson and Ken Baker; they are always friendly and helpful. I dropped off my truck for service (oil change, tire rotation, etc.) and Ken Baker called back to notify me that my vehicle was ready. As far I know, the work was done satisfactorily.

name: Charles Bailey
text: I’ve never had any problems with them. Good quality work on time. They’ll tell you if something else needs to be looked at.

name: Samantha Stefan
text: I have purchased 3 Vehicles from this Dealership with my Husband and have had the same salesman Austyn ! He is Humble and Honest and that means a lot these days when purchasing a vehicle. They met my expectations and we will continue to buy from here as long as he is there. The best experiences I have ever had at any Dealership and I have bought many vehicles in my lifetime!!! Thank you Austyn you Rock !!!

name: Alfonso Packer
text: Consumer service was very poor. Upon arrival to pick up my car after recall work I had to stand in the lobby for 20mins before I was even acknowledged to get help. Then the service guy who said he had my paper so he would him me continued a phone call for an additional 30 mins. It didn’t bother me until I heard the conversation, which seemed personal not AutoNation business related, so I decided to go to parts while I waited to get so things. That department was great. After finishing up he still was on phone so I went to someone else to see if I could be helped then he decided to pull up my paperwork and noticed it was a recall job and only need a signature and to hand me my keys. I will never probably use the service department if that was a example of the customer service to expect.

name: Richard Dodson
text: Had some warranty work done on my 2019 Ram 1500. Troy was very knowledgeable of what needed to be done, and the service technicians did a great with the small issues that had, andchad my truck ready to go in a timely manner. Great job Autonation team.

name: Ms. Kay
text: Great service team. Ken was extremely patient throughout the journey. I experienced some flood damage in September 2019 that required major repairs to include a rental for a few weeks. Updates were offered and a complete thorough summary of what was serviced. Ken and the team wereprofessional. My vehicle was as showroom ready as the day I purchased it from them. Roll Tide.

name: Daijha Doss
text: NONE of my experiences at autonation have been pleasant. I’m either here all day or have to leave my car for days at a time because they can’t seem to do their jobs. My car was there for 2 days just to get the battery changed (I kid you not). Now I’m waiting on a part for my car and dear lord you would think they had to actually build the part themselves. I’ve been told 3 different stories about this part. I’ve had my car for almost 4 years now and EVERY SINGLE TIME I’m in there someone is upset about how they run this place. Now I’m that someone. Thanks for nothing Autonation. Keep up the good work.

name: Rick McNeill

Was given a call 20 min before closing time and said that my ride was ready, got there 40 min later due to traffic and they said they closed. So honestly never doing business with this dealership ever again. I suggest everyone get oil changes at Honda rather than this dealership... buy your cars somewhere else, the bad service outweighs the quality of their trucks.

Great company, great atmosphere, and it was awesome working with Chris and Austin

name: Dana Adcock
text: 10 years ago we bought a new Jeep Grand Cherokee.   No one has ever touched this car but Auto Nation.  A couple months age my husband took the car in for repair.  A new condenser had to be installed.  After the work was completed, when we picked the car up, the dash lights were out.   We were told there would be an additional $300 or more to fix it.  This was very shabby business as it was fine before the work was done.   I’ve had a couple of issues with this establishment but let it go but this is going to far to expect us to pay for something that was broken while a very expensive repair was being done on the car.

text: Sid was very helpful throughout the whole process of repairing my wife’s vehicle through the extended warranty.  He spent time on the phone dealing with my warranty company and when it came time he even drove me in his own vehicle to the rental company.

name: Diane Krause
text: I took my car in for repair of the power adjustment on the driver seat. The service rep who took care of me made the scheduling and check-in nice and easy and arranged for the shuttle service to take me home. I was disappointed that the AutoNation website didn't allow me to schedule an appointment for repairs online (only maintenance services could be done online). I got a diagnosis and repair quote within a day, but word that it would take a week to get the part in. It turned out to be an additional day for the part to arrive, and I was told the car would be done the following day, but  it took two more days for it to get done. We came from the Houston area where we were used to parts being accessible more quickly, so this wait time may be normal for the Mobile area. The pickup experience was a bit frustrating. I picked up on a Saturday and waited 1 hour 15 minutes to get checked out (was told the car was ready but paperwork had to be done). The service rep kept getting pulled away by walk-ins, phone calls, and I'm not sure what else, but it seemed I kept getting bumped to the back of the line. There may have been more legitimate reasons for the long wait time, but those weren't shared with me. Everyone was nice and helpful, and my car was repaired, but the wait times were a bit disappointing.

Karen in the online department was great to sit with while the service guys did a quick inspection and prepared the paperwork and check.  If you're looking to sell a vehicle and don't want to mess with CL or haggle with another dealer, autonation was great for me.

text: My last experience. Rude , sold me a tire with not 1, but 3 plugs in one tire, wow, I'm an older widow. They should not be allowed to sell tires with plugs in them. Never trust again. No offer for any assistance. Patched it said fixed. NOT. My safety will be with someone else.

text: Always Done great service  for me and my family cars Thank You!!!

name: Christopher Suchaski
text: This place is fantastic. Went looking for an inner tube for my zero turn and checked everywhere in town to no avail. Ordered one off of Ebay and brought it to the guys here to put it on. Come to find out, it was the wrong size, but to my surprise, the one place in Eufaula that I DIDN'T check for this tube, WAS HERE!!! AND THEY HAD IT!!! For the same price, minus shipping, that I paid for it on Ebay!! These guys are fantastic, fast, and VERY friendly. Something that other businesses in town can can take points from. Will make sure to check with these guys FIRST for my tire needs from now on. Great job guys!!

name: Randy Pruehs
text: Staff was very friendly. I received 2 very good used tires for $90.00. I would have bought 4 new tires but they didn't have my size in stock.

Was good an friendly!
Had me up an rolling!

name: craig martin
text: These guys are amazing! Quality work every time at unbelievable speed and low low prices! They DON'T try to break the bank. I am always speechless as to how cost effective their work is and fast. Thanks guts for ALWAYS being FAIR , FRIENDKY & FAST!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for taking time out of your day to leave such a kind review!

name: Miguel Davis
text: Great and quick service.

resp.text: That’s really nice to hear, thank-you!

name: Mitchell G Lattof Jr
text: I had gone to Pep Boys to get my headlight repaired. After keeping my car for 3 days trying to "diagnose" an electrical problem, Pep Boys informed me that I needed my entire headlight assembly replaced and it would take a week to get the part in and cost $2,700.00. I declined and took my car to Downtown Car Care for a 2nd opinion. After an hour or so, DCC determined that all I needed was a FUSE replaced and a new bulb. DCC saved me $2,500+ and they'll be my first "go-to" place for future repairs. They are extremely professional and friendly and I was very impressed with how clean their shop is. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Mitchell. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us

name: Alison Herlihy
text: Harold and everyone at Downtown Car Care did a great job getting my classic car up and running again! There aren't many mechanics around who can work on a 60+ year old car, let alone who will be totally honest with you about what they can do and do the work for a fair price. I'd recommend Downtown Car Care to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the great recommendation Alison! Always nice to hear from satisfied customers!

name: John Pickering
text:
Super fast, friendly team. The owner greeted me warmly, and his friendly team kept great communication. The price was downright astoundingly good for such a well-kept, professional garage in the downtown area.

I live in the downtown area and Downtown Car Care will be my garage for my maintenance needs from now on.

resp.text: John, thank you so much for the review and excellent feedback! Please come see us again anytime in the future!

name: Brittany Costello
text: Hands down the best experience I’ve ever had with a car repair shop! I got a flat tire just hours before my flight was scheduled to leave and they we’re able to fit me in and finish the job extremely fast, the day before a major holiday! The staff was a delight to work with... Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us, it was our pleasure Brittany!

name: J. Craig Dickson
text: Fast and friendly service. Extremely reasonable rates compared to dealerships and you still have ASE Certified Mechanics that can do the work you can trust! I have known Harold 2 decades and he is as good as they get in bringing resolution to a car issue or concern. I would trust my mom, my wife, my sister and any daughter to go there alone and know they would be well taken care of there! Great job Harold and Chris!!

resp.text: We're delighted to hear how much trust and confidence you have in us! Thanks for the amazing review!

name: Fatima DZ
text: Just moved in town and finally i found a honest guys that can fix my car without breaking other parts. Chris is the guy that you should talk. I will give 7 * to him.

resp.text: Thank you so much Fatima! I appreciate you taking the time to leave a review.

name: Michael Scott
text:
My girlfriend and I recently came into some critical car troubles while we were moving to New Orleans. We stopped in the nearest town which was Mobile. We took our van to Downtown Car Care and they helped us out big time. We were looking at a 1000+ service request to change and fix our transfer case. We didn't have that kind of time or money to stay there and wait for that to happen. It is a 94' so they would have had to track down the part first. Time is money. The dudes at the shop found a temporary way to get our van running safely without even changing it. Ran and still runs like a beaut. Only charged us $20 for the whole thing. Easily could have taken our asses for a ride. Solid people working at this place and would recommend them to anyone if i lived in Mobile.

Thanks for all your help.

resp.text: I’m so glad to hear you had such a positive experience! Thank you!

name: Only Hazardous (Ryan Nichols)
text: My name is Ryan, and I’ve dealt with Harold personally on MANY accounts and I have never once been dissatisfied. Super friendly guy, honest, and he’ll get the job done quick. 10 out of 10 will do business again!

resp.text: So happy to hear you have always been satisfied with our services. We really appreciate the review you have left us!

name: Unicorn Sparkle with Anne Michael
text: I had a flat tire the other day while I was downtown. The people at Downtown Car Care really took exceptional care of me! They were so friendly and welcoming when I pulled in. They knew I needed my car fixed quickly since it was almost time for carpool that afternoon.  They were quick with patching my tire, and got me back on the road in no time! I will definitely be going back to see Harold at Downtown Car Care!

resp.text: We love hearing from satisfied customers! It makes all the hard work worth it. Thank you!

name: Luke Hildreth
text: They were more then fair with price . I was in a bind and they  were amazing.

resp.text: We're glad we could help, thank you Luke. Take care!

name: john
text: I brought my wife's car in for a few things (power steering pump, alignment, and oil leak) right before we left for vacation. As we were on vacation the shop kept us updated on everything that was going on. (A part was having to be ordered from out of state) The original quote was $1,000 which I was OK with because they wanted to do a transmission flush as well. For the amount of work and parts I was happy with price. They called about half way through our week long trip to give us an update and the shop owner stated he would have it done before we got back or worst case senario, the day we got back. He also stated he thought it would be a bit cheaper, about $950, well that's great. No problem there! So the day we got home he called and said the car was finished and that he was able to do all the work for $860!!! He very well could have charged me the $1000 and I would have gladly payed. He instead did the honorable thing and charged me what it cost him! Also, very clean shop!!

resp.text: Thank you, John! We’re thrilled that you’re happy with our services.

name: Deona Elaine
text: I was on my way to New Orleans and blew a tire on the interstate on the way. Downtown car care was the closest place to me and I’m so glad I was able to get their help. As soon as I called, they sent a tow truck and the owner was able to work with me on the cost of the tire I needed. Because I had a security bolt on my wheel and didn’t have the key for it, they had to remove the bolt — and they handled it for free! Instead of replacing both tires in the back, they only replaced the one that blew after looking at the condition of the other wheel which was super helpful since I told them I was on a budget. Since I’m a female, I’ve always felt wary of mechanics, but since visiting this shop, they’ve restored my faith in the business! Thank you for your hard work, flexibility, and kindness!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review, Deona! We take great strides to make sure our clients are satisfied and appreciate when a client sees that we work hard on their behalf.

name: John Connolly
text: Fast service. Friendly staff. Really helped us out in a bind and got us back on the road again quickly. Breaking down in an unfamiliar area, states away from home, can be daunting. Everyone was exceptional.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave such a thoughtful review, John. It’s customers like you that make our job so enjoyable!

name: Cody Plaisance
text: My wife and I were traveling to Gulf Shores from Baton Rouge for a family vacation and at 3:00 both our rear breaks went out and we managed to get it to Downtown Car Care and they took it in, fixed it, and were back on the road in no time at all. This was all at an extremely reasonable price and would recommend these people to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We hope your vacation goes super awesome!

name: NamJung Homeschool
text:
I am YounJi from University of Alabama. My family and I had a trip to Mobile, and our car stopped working on a roadside. We looked up all the reviews and chose "Downtown Car Care" to help us.

The car broke down at 3pm on Friday. We thought there is no way to fix this car since it was late of the day. However, this place shocked me with the fastest service. They changed the broken alternator and replace to a new one in an hour. We really didn't wait at all. Plus, their customer service was great (the nicest mechanics ever seen!).

I truly recommend this place. This place saved our summer trip.
Again, choose this place for your car repair.

I also want to leave a thank-you note to the crew. Thank you for your amazing service!

resp.text: All in a day’s work, glad you’re happy with the results!

name: Tony Anthony
text: My name is Tony & I am the Service Manager at Colony One Auto Center in Stafford Tx. Our shop pride's itself in excellent customer service, after dealing with Harold Burns/ Chris over a potential catastrophe with one of our customers traveling through Mobile..........I can't be more grateful there are shops like this! These guy's were courteous, immediate and effective, its hard to get all those on the drop of a dime in an emergency situation. If anyone is travelling through Mobile (or near) or live in the area of, don't take my word for it, give these guy's a try! My thanks and gratitude for all you did Mr. Burns, Chris and the business as a whole!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! I’m so glad you were happy with everything.

text: Talethia really went above and beyond to take care of me. Really needed new brakes and rotors. Very pleased with the quick turn around time and reasonable pricing. Will be back 😀

name: Chloe Photography
text:
Never been happier! Eugene has very good customer service and took care of all of my needs plus some! Thank you so much! Highly recommend

**UPDATE: A couple days after leaving the shop I noticed the brakes seemed to be sticking some. I chopped it up to new brakes and rotors. 2 months after service and every time I get on the freeway my tires shake and when I brake after getting off the exit the shaking is horrible, brakes jump and pulsate. I have pulled over twice this week to see if I see any issues and have noticed smoke coming from my brake pad area. I will never use this place again. Now I have to Fix the brakes and rotors I just got. Not to mention I was conned I to getting some kind of contract deal at a good price. Come to find out I was mislead and instead of paying $1038.00 through monthly payments. I have to pay a total of $2500 through weekly payments. All I wanted was brakes and rotors and had cash on hand but was talked into tires and some more things that “I needed”

resp.text: Hello Chloe, we could not locate any information in our system for you. When you get a moment, you can contact our consumer solutions department at 914-984-2500 option #2 referencing your ticket number 0500-539009.

text: Manager seemed aloof and detached...Did not appear to go the extra mile for customer satisfaction. Changed more for service rendered than what was quoted by appointment staff

text: Eugene was the nicest,  most helpful person. He made me feel at ease and reassured me about my tires. I felt like Mavis (Eugene) was trustworthy and was very sympathetic to my needs. Will absolutely go back !

text: Went and got my tires rotated and oil changed for a very good reasonable price. Thanks to Mr. Eugene and his staff this is my second time going to this particular Mavis store, which they care for there customers needs and they make sure they get you in and out. Thanks to you  guys my car drives better to get me to point a and b.  I will be coming back to visit. 💯‼️

text: Late post... visited a few weeks ago for oil change. As always Eugene greets customers with a smile.  got my oil changed in a timely fashion.  service was on point.  social distancing of the seats would be a good thing to implement

name: Danielle Matthews
text: Absolutely terrible service! A women set up an appointment for me to come on Thursday at 8am to get tires. Only for them to turn me around and tell me that they do not make appointments before the tires are there. (I was informed over the phone that my tires would be there on Wednesday.) The man told me the tires would be there at 1pm. 1o’clock turn into 3 o’clock I called them back and still no tires. I received a callback around 4:30 tell me the truck came however my tires wasn’t on the truck. They found my tires at another location and said they will would put them on the next day. If you have the tires I need at one of your other locations why didn’t you go get them or send me to your other location. The man who called me back the last time did not seem remorseful and did not apologize for wasting my entire day.

resp.text: We apologize, Danielle When you get a moment, you can contact our consumer solutions department at 914-984-2500 option #2 and we would be happy to assist you. .
